ẜoͤwim . Waitʒa tu / kurr Wings attraſtins ? Eekſchan ẜawu
Wahrdu / eekſchan Ꞩwaͤhtu Wackar⸗Ehdeni .
Tee Baͤhrni Jſrael iſẜabijajahs ļohte / kad Deews patʒ arr
teems runnaja / tee behdſe / und ghaja iß⸗tahlenes / luhdſe Moſen /
ka Wings ghribbaͤtu ar teems runnaht / aiſto tee nhe warreja
Deewa barrghu Ballxni paneẜt . Toͤw / Manns Draugs / nhe
wajagha iſẜabieteeß / Deews gir ẜawà Weetà ẜuhtijis ẜawu
Kallpu / tawu Mahʒetaju unnd Baſniʒas⸗Kunghu / tam gir
Wings to Spaͤhku dehwis toͤw to Ghraͤko⸗Peedoẜchanu pa-
ẜluddenaht / und ko taß toͤw us JESV Chriſti Wahrdu pee-
dohß / taß buhß arridſan Debbeſẜieß peedohts . Kapehts ghrib-
bi tad tu nu kahweeteeß ? kadehļ nhe ghribbi tu no tahms Ꞩai-
tehms to Ghraͤko und Wallgheems ta ļauna Waͤlla attpeſtieſts
tapt ? To juhß paſẜchi warreeta praẜt : Kad kaßlabb{kaß labbà} Ꞩeextà
jeb Ʒeetumà gir / taß jo ghribbahß peẜtiets ; Vnnd tu / O Ʒillwaͤ-
ka Baͤhrns / nhe ghribbeeß lickteeß peẜtiet no to Ꞩeextu und Ʒee-
tumu ta nickna Waͤlla ? No to warr uhs to Pawehleẜchanu
JESV CHRJSTJ taws Mahʒetais toͤw attpeſtiet .
To paſẜchu apdohmadams / Mieļo / manns Baͤhrns / tawu
Mahʒeetaju / und ʒeeni to / aiſto winjam leela und dahrgha Lee-
ta no Chriſto JESV ustitʒaͤta . Taß ẜwaͤhts Pahwils ẜacka :
Mehß
Mehß luhdſam jums / Mieļi Brahļi / ka juhß attſieſtaht
tohß kattri py jums ſtrahda / unnd jums preekſcha⸗ſtahw
eekſchan to Kunghu / unnd jums pamahʒa . Mieļojeeta
tohß jo wairahk winjo Darrbo dehļ / unnd dſiewojee-
ta meerighe ar teems . Eſẜeeta paklauſẜighi juhſẜeems Mah-
ʒetajeems / unnd darraita tha ka winji jums mahʒa / aiſto
winji mohdrighi gir par juhſẜeems Dwehſẜeeleems / ka tee /
kattreems Lahghadiba ja⸗dohd girr par jums / ka tee to
preeʒadammeeß darra / und nhe nopuhsdameeß / aiſto taß
nhe girr jums labb . Ja juhß tad nu ẜcho Mahʒibu waͤhrà
jembſẜeeta / und eekſchan Chriſtum JEſum titʒeſẜeeta / tad juhß ar-
ridſan ar Winju eekſchan tahß muhſchighas Ghohdibas ee⸗eeſ-
ẜeeta ; To pallieds jumms Deews taß Taͤhws / Daͤhls unnd
Ꞩwaͤhtais Gharrs / AMEN .
Evangelium am Sontage
Miſericordias Domini, Jo-
To ẜwaͤhtu Ewangelium / No to Labbu Ghannu / aprax-
ta taß Ꞩwaͤhts Ewangeliſts Jahnis ẜawà Ghramatà
tan Deßmittan Weetan / unnd ſkann tee Wahrdi juhſẜà
Wallodà tha :
JEſus
JESVS ẜatʒija us teems
Juddeems : Eß aͤßmu weens
labbs Ghanns / weens labbs
Ghanns dohd ẜawu Dſiewibu
par tahm Ahweem . Bett weens
ẜaddaͤrraͤhts Ghanns / katters
Ghanns nhe girr / kam tahß Ahwis nhe peedaͤrr /
raͤds to Willku nahkoht / und attſtahy tahß Ahwis /
und baͤhgh . Vnd taß Willx ẜakammp und ißtraͤnntʒ
tahß Ahwis . Bett taß ẜaddaͤrraͤhts Ghanns
baͤhgh / Aiſto taß gir ẜaͤddaͤrraͤhts / und nhe ohla tahß
Ahwis . Eß aͤßmu weens labbs Ghanns / und ſinnu
mannas Ahwis / unnd winji paſieſt mann . Lieds
ka mann manns Taͤhws paſieſt / und es paſieſtu to
Taͤhwu / und eß dohmu ẜawu Dſiewibu par tahm
Ahweem .
Ahweem . Vnd mann gir wehl ʒittas Ahwis / tahß
nhe gir no ẜchahß Kuhts / ( Dunæburg. & Ꞩeelburg. pro-
nunciant Klaͤhwa ) unnd tahß paſẜchaß buhß mann
arridſan ẜcheitan daweſt / und tahß dſirrdehß man-
nu Ballxni / unnd buhß weenam Ahwja⸗Pullkam
und weenam Ghannam buht .
ꞨChis ẜwaͤhts Ewangeliums peedaͤrr
eekſchan to Treſẜchu Lohʒekli muhſẜas ẜwaͤhtas
Titʒibas / kurr mehß tha ẜackam : Eß titʒu wee-
nu ẜwaͤhtu Chriſtitu Baſniʒu / kurr JEſus
Chriſtus taß Wirrßneex / Ghallwa / und ihſtaͤns
labbs Ghanns gir / mehß attkall aͤſẜam Winja
Klauſẜetaji / Lohʒekļi und Ahwis / und Deewam⸗ſchaͤhl / mehß nhe
warram py ẜcho muhſẜo Ghannu ar muhſẜu paſẜchu Spaͤhku und
Ꞩapraſẜchanu nahkt / und eekſchan to titʒeht / bett ar ẜawu miele-
ghu Ballxni / ar ẜawu ẜwaͤhtu Wahrdu aiʒena Wings mums
py ẜoͤw / ja Wings dawaͤd mums py ẜoͤw / und pallieds / ka mehß
to warram paſiet /
Paſẜargha mums par ẜweſſchu Mahʒibu /
Ka mehß ʒittu Mahʒetaju nhe mecklejam wairs /
Ka JEſum Chriſt arr patteeſẜu Titʒibu /
Vnd us to no Ꞩirrds palaiſchameeß :
Aiſto Wings ẜawu ſchehlighu und mielighu Ꞩirrdi ar to gir pa-
radijis / ka Wings irr ẜawu Dſiewibu par mums ẜaweems Aiti-
ņeems gir dewis / und mums paſudduẜchus und paſuhdena-
tus Ʒillwaͤkus attpeſtijis / unnd attpirrʒis / no wiſẜeems
Ghraͤkeems / no to Nahwu / unnd to Spaͤku tha Waͤlla /
tha Elles Willka / nhe ar Saͤlltu jeb ar Ꞩuddrabu / bett ar
ẜawu dahrghu Ꞩwaͤhtu Aſẜini / und ar ẜawu nhenopellni-
tu Ʒee-
tu Ʒeeſchanu unnd Nahwu / ka eß Winjam paſẜcham pe-
daͤrraͤtu ; taß gir / ko JEſus Chriſtus patʒ ẜcheitan ẜacka : Eß
aͤßmu weens labbs Ghanns / weens labbs Ghanns dohd
ẜawu Dſiewibu par tahms Ahweems .
Laideeta mums nu apdohmat und mahʒiteeß / ka Chriſtus
JEſus muhſẜo ihſtaͤns Ghanns gir / unnd ka mums ka
Winja Ahweems turreteeß buhß .
Bett Deews tha Meera / katters no teems Mirroņeems gir
ißweddiß to Leelu Ghannu to Ahwjo / ʒaur to Aſẜini tahß muh-
ſchighas Eeſtadiẜchanas / muhſẜu Kunghu JEſum Chriſtum /
taß darra juhß ghattawus eekſchan wiſẜu labbu Darrbu / darriet
ko Wings ghribb / und darra eekſchan jums / kaß preekſchan Win-
ju patiek / ʒaur JEſum Chriſtum / kattram gir Ghohds muhſchighe
muhſcham / Amen .
MAnni mieļi Draughi / kad Chriſtus JEſus ẜoͤw eekſchan
ẜcho ẜwaͤhtu Ewangelio dehwe weenu Ghannu / ẜatʒi-
dams : Eß aͤßmu weens labbs Ghanns / tad runna
Wings ar teems waͤtʒeems Proweeteems / kattri to arridſan wee-
nu Ghannu dehwe : aiſto tha ẜacka Konings Dawids : Taß
Kungs gir manns Ghanns / mann nhe neeka waijadſehß /
und attkal : Tu Ghanns Jſraeļa / katters tu Joſepu ẜarr-
ghi ka taß Awis . Ja kad Wings ẜoͤw ẜautʒ weenu Ghannu /
tad Wings ar to Wahrdu mums ghribb ẜawu peetitʒighu Ꞩirr-
di parahdiet / unnd ẜawu leelu Mielaͤſtibu ? Wings ghribb
ẜawu Aujo⸗pullku ghanniet ka kahds Ghanns / Wings
tohß Aitiņus ẜawahß Rohkahß ẜajembs / und ẜawà Aſoty
neſẜieß / und tahß Aujo⸗Mahtiteß waddieß . Ʒitti Ghanni
ẜarrgha unnd ghanna Lohpus : ka Jaͤcobs ẜawa Brahļa Labana
Awis ghannija / ka Moſes ẜawas Ꞩeewas Taͤhwa Awis ghan-
nija ; bett Jeſus Chriſtus gir muhſẜo Dwehſẜelo Ghanns / ʒaur
kattru
kattru Deews mums ißredſejis gir / pirms tahß Paſẜaules
Dibbins lickts tappa / ka mums by buht ẜwaͤhtus und nhe-
noſeedſighus preekſchan Winju eekſchan tahß Mielaͤſti-
bas / und gir mums ißwehlejis ka Wings mums Baͤhrna⸗
weetà usjembtu prett ẜoͤw paſẜcham / ʒaur ẜcho muhſẜo
Kunghu JEſum Chriſtum / pehtʒ to Pattickſchanu ẜawa
labba Prahta / ʒaur kattru Wings mums ẜajemmighus
darrijis gir eekſchan to Mieļotu . Ꞩchiß gir taß Ghanns /
ʒaur kattru wiſẜi Ahwis und Deewa⸗Baͤhrni dabbu Ghannibu /
Preeku / Dſiewibu und to muhſchighu Schaͤlaſtibu . O ẜwaͤhtʒ /
eſẜi tu / O Ʒillwaͤhx / kad toͤw tahds Ghanns gir . Nhe kahda
Nhelaime gir tick leela / Wings warr toͤw palliedſeht / ka Wings
patʒ ẜacka : Es taß Kungs aͤßmu weens Deews par wiſẜu
Meeſẜu / es warru wiſẜas Leetas darriet . Kad Wings
ghribb palliedſeht / tad nhe warr Winjam nhe neeka kahweht .
Nhekahda Ꞩaͤhrgha tick ghruta / tick leela / Wings warr dſeede-
naht . Aiſto Wings gir taß Kungs / muhſẜo Ahrſts . Ko
nhekada Sahle / nhe kahds Plaſters dſeedenaht warr / to
dſeedena ẜcha Ghanna Wahrds / taß wiſẜu dſeedina .
Nhe kahda Weeta tick tahļ gir / ẜchiß Ghanns JEſus Chriſtus
gir patʒ irr tuwe klaht / Wings nhe gir tahļe no ick⸗kattru
muhſẜo ſtarrpà / aiſto eekſchan Winju{Winjo} mehß dſiewojam /
kuẜtenajameeß / und aͤſẜam / ka Wings patʒ ẜacka : Es aͤßmu
taß Kungs wiſẜur us Semmes . Nhe kahds Kruhms / nhe
kahds Meẜch tick beeß gir / tick tumbß / JEſus Chriſtus ẜkatta
ʒaur / und raͤds toͤw / und attrohd toͤw / kad buhtu tu arridſan bijis
paſẜchà Tuxneſẜi / no wiſẜeems Mahtes⸗Baͤhrneems iß⸗kliediß .
Ꞩchiß Ghanns und Kungs ſinna / kaß Tumbẜumà ghull / ai-
ſto py Winju gir tickai Skaidriba / preekſch Winja Atʒeems
nheneeka nhe gir paẜlaͤhptʒ . Klauſẜi wehl / Manns Draugs /
ja tu ghribbi py Deewu nahkt / tad turraiß tu py ẜcho Ghannu /
ʒaur
ʒaur to tapẜi tu ẜwaͤhtʒ unnd Deewa Baͤhrns . No ẜcho dohd
wiſẜi Proweetes Leeʒibu / ka ʒaur Winja Wahrdu / wiſ-
ẜeems / kattri eekſchan to titʒ / Pedoẜchanu to Ghraͤko dab-
buit buhß . Vnd tapehtʒ gir Wings arridſan ẜawu Dſiewibu
par toͤw dehwis . Ta gir leela Mielaͤſtiba / kattru tu nhe warri ar
tawu Prahtu ghann ißdohmaht . Jem waͤhrà / manns Draugs /
tohß Wahrdus / kad JEſus Chriſtus ẜacka : Weens labbs
Ghanns dohd ẜawu Dſiewibu par tahms Ahweems / und
attkall ẜacka Wings : Es dohmu ẜawu Dſiewibu par tahms
Ahweems . Weens labbs Ghanns / kad wings raͤds to Will-
ku ſkreijam ſtarrpan tahms Ahweems / tad eeẜahk taß ẜaukt / taͤck
klahte / ja wings warr paẜneekt ar Kohku / tad ẜitt wings to Will-
ku / und nhe dohd tam Waļļu / weenu Aitiņu maitaht / gir wings
to jaw Mutteh ẜaghrahbis / tad tetʒinus{taͤtʒinus} taͤck taß Ghanns pa-
ckaļļ / und peẜti ʒeek ſpaͤhdams to Ahwi no ta Swaͤhra Muttes .
Jhten to gir darrijis taß Kungs JESVS Chriſtus py mums /
kad taß Elles⸗Willx / taß ļauns Waͤlls / us mums lahwejahß /
unnd mums wiſẜus apriet ghribbeja / dſinnas wings tam packaļ /
dehwe ẜawu Dſiewibu par mums / ka mehß to Dſiewibu und Deb-
beſẜo Wallſtibu dabbuitam / und attpeſtija mums no tha Waͤlla
Spaͤhku . Klauſẜi / manns Draugs / ka Deewa Ghramatà no to
Leetu raxtietʒ ſtahw : Patteeſẜe / Wings ( JEſus ) neſẜe muhſẜo
Nhewaͤſẜaͤlibu / und us⸗lickahß muhſẜas Ꞩahpes : Wings
gir muhſẜo Noſeeghumo dehļ ee⸗wainohts / und muhſẜo
Ghraͤhko dehļ ẜakulltʒ / Ta Ꞩohdibu ghull us Winju / ka
mums Meers buhtu / und ʒaur Winja Wahteems aͤſẜam
mehß dſeedenahti ; CHRJſtus JESVS muhſẜo labbs
Ghanns ẜacka patʒ : Eß ghribbu tohß no tahß Elles att-
peſtiet / und no Nahwes palliedhſeht / Nahwe es ghribbu
toͤw weens Dſaͤllohns buht / unnd Elle toͤw ghribbu eß
Mehris buht .
Taß
Taß ẜwaͤhts Apuſtuls Pahwils ẜacka : CHRJſtus gir to
Drauds mieļojis / und gir ẜoͤw paſẜchu preekſchan tahß no-
dehweeß . Vnd taß Ewangeliſts Jahnis ẜacka : Py to aͤſẜam
mehs to Mielaͤſtibu attſinnuẜchi / ka Chriſtus ẜawu Dſie-
wibu muhſẜo dehļ dehwis gir .
Vnnd tam{taß} buhß mums par leelu Eepreeʒenaẜchanu buht .
Ghribb toͤw taß ļauns Waͤlls pahrrunnaht / Chriſtus toͤw nhe
aͤſẜohtʒ ſchaͤhliegs / Wings toͤw nhe mieļojohtʒ ; tad tudeļļ attgha-
dajeeß tohß Wahrdus / kattrus Wings ẜcheitan runna eekſchan
ẜcho Ewangelio : Es dohmu mannu Dſiewibu par man-
neems Ahweems . Draugs Draughu arridſan ghann
mieļo / weens ohtru mieļo ka ẜawu Ꞩirrdi . Bett dauds dedſi-
ghaka gir ta Mielaͤſtiba / kattru JEſus Chriſtus prett toͤw / O
Ʒillwaͤka Baͤhrns turr . Aiſto Wings toͤw mieļo nhe ween ka
ẜawu Ꞩirrdi / bett wairahk nhe ka ẜawu paſẜchu Dſiewibu / kattru
Wings toͤwis dehļ dohd / ka tu muhſchighe dſiewoht warraͤtu .
Ja Wings tad nu tick dauds no leelas ẜirrdighas Mielaͤſtibas
py toͤw gir darrijis / kad tu wehl Winja Eenaidneex biji / tad
Wings jo toͤw nu wehl wairahk mieļohß / kad Wings toͤw jaw
ʒaur ẜawu Aſẜini und Nomirrẜchanu par ẜawu paſẜchu Ahwi att-
pirrʒis gir . Ka Wings mielojis gir ẜawus Ļaudis / kattri
ẜchinny Paſẜauleh by / tha Wings tohß mieļo lieds patt
Ghallam . Wings gir ar mums weenu muhſchighu Ꞩa-
liedſenaẜchanu darrijis / ka Wings nhe ghribb nomiẜt /
mums labb darriet / taß gir Wings ghribb mums allaſch beß
Mitteẜchanas labb darriet / ẜawu Schaͤlaſtibu nhe buhß no
mums attſtaht . Tapehtʒ / manns Draugs / paļaujeeß tu al-
laſchien us ẜcho Schaͤlaſtibu / kahda Liegsdà / kadahs Baͤhdahß
buhdams / ẜacki tu : Taß Kungs ( JEſus ) gir ar mann / ko
warr mann Ʒillwaͤki darriet ? Gir tawi Ghraͤki ghruti / eſẜi
tu dauds ghraͤkojis ? redſi / tad gir arridſan tha Nauda ghruhta und
krahßna /
krahßna / ko JEſus Chriſtus preekſchan toͤw ẜkatijis gir / tu eſẜi
dahrghe attpirrckts ; und ta Nauda ko Chriſtus JEſus toͤwis
dehļ gir nodehwis / nhe gir no Saͤlltu / nei no Ꞩuddrabu / bett
Wings gir ẜawu paſẜchu Meeſẜu und Aſẜini toͤwis dehl nodeh-
wis / ka Wings patʒ ẜacka : Ta Ʒillwaͤka nhe gir nahʒis / ka
Wings ẜoͤw licktohß kallpoteeß / bett ka Wings kallpotu /
und dohtu ẜawu Dſiewibu par Attpeſtiẜchanu preekſchan
dauds Ļaudeems . Ja / Deews gir ẜawu Drauds dabbu-
jeeß / ʒaur ẜawu paſẜchu Aſẜini / kaß warr toͤw nu paſuddenaht ?
ẜchis Nopaͤllns tha Kungha Chriſti JEſu toͤw arridſan peedaͤrr /
aiſto tu eſẜi weena Awis no Chriſti JESV Ghannibas / weens
Lohʒeklis winja Draudſibas und Baſniʒas / no kattreems wings
ẜcheitan ẜacka : Eß dohmu ẜawu Dſiewibu par tahms Ah-
weems . Jo mehß wiſẜi ißkliduẜchi bijam ka Awis / ick kat-
tris ſkattijahß us ẜawu Ʒeļļu / bett taß Kungs mette wiſẜus
muhſẜus ( und wiſẜo muhſẜo ) Ghraͤkus us Winju . Weens
Deews gir / und weens Widdetaiß / ſtarrpà Deewu unnd
teems Ʒillwaͤkeems / ar Wahrdu taß Ʒillwaͤhx JESVS
Chriſtus / katters ẜoͤw paſẜchu dehweeß gir par Attpeſti-
ẜchanu preekſch wiſẜeems / ẜacka taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils .
Kaß nu to titʒ / taß nhe tohp ẜodietʒ / bett kaß nhe titʒ / taß gir
jaw ẜohdietʒ unnd paſudenahts / aiſto taß nhe titʒ eekſchan to
Wahrdu ta weenigha peedſimbta Deewa Daͤhla .
Ꞩchiß Ghanns Chriſtus JEſus ẜawu Labbumu eekſchan
to parahda / ka Winjam drohẜcha Ꞩirrds gir . Ꞩcheitan wings
ta ẜacka : Weens ẜaddaͤrraͤhtʒ Ghanns ( weens Allghadſis )
katters Ghanns nhe gir / kam tahs Ahwis nhe peedaͤrr /
raͤds to Willku nahkoht / und attſtahy tahß Ahwis / unnd
baͤhg / unnd taß Willx ẜakamp / unnd ißtraͤnntʒ tahß Ah-
wis . Daſẜch Ghanns tohp attraſts / tam tick bailigha Ꞩirrds /
kad wings raͤds Willku nahkam / tad taß attkahp / ẜlepjahß patʒ /
und
und baͤhg no tahms Ahweems . Bett tada bailigha Ꞩirrds
JEſu Chriſto muhſẜam ihſtaͤnam Ghannam nhe gir / Wings
ẜawis Ahwis ļohte dahrghe gir pirrʒeeß / Wings ẜawu paſẜchu
Dſiewibu nodehwe / tapehtʒ nhe warr Wings tohß attſtaht .
Winjam arri nheweens ja⸗bieſtahß / Wings tick ſpehʒiegs{ſpaͤhʒiegs} / ka
Wings to / kaß Winjam prettie turrahß / ar weenu Wahrdu / ja
ar weenu Pirrxta⸗Krattiẜchanu nhe ween beedinaht / bett arridſan
kluſẜenaht unnd ẜaẜiſt warr . Wings gir weens Deews par
wiſẜeems Deeweems / und Kungs wiſẜo Kungho / weens
leels Deews / ſpaͤhʒiegs und barrgs /
Nahwe / Ghraͤki / Waͤlls / Dſiewiba uñ Schaͤlaſtiba /
Wiß eekſchan ẜawahms Rohkams gir /
Taß warr attpeſtiet /
Wiſẜus kattri py to ſtaigha .
Nahk nu taß Elles⸗Willx / taß Waͤlls / und ghribb toͤw apriet ? ka
tad Wings / ka kahds Semm⸗taͤckuls / Deenahß und Nacktis
ẜchurrp und turrp ſtaigha / ka kahds bļaudams plehſẜiegs
Swaͤhrs{Swehrs} / unnd meckle / kattru Wings warraͤtu apriet :
O ho / nhe ißtruhʒenajeeß tu Chriſti JESV Aitiņa / tu Deewa⸗
Baͤhrns : Taws Ghanns nhe ghull / neds ẜnauſch / wings
gir py toͤw ickdeenas / lieds patt Paſẜaules ghallam / wings
toͤw apklahje appackſch to Aehnu ẜawas Rohkas / ta arri-
dſan / ka tahß Elles Wahrti toͤw nhe ſpeh pahrwalldiet /
wings gir toͤw / und wiſẜahß ẜawas Ahwis / ẜawà Rohkà tick
ſtippre ee⸗ẜledſis / ka nhe weens winjam tohß warrehß iß-
raut . Nu warri tu / O Deewa Baͤhrns / arr droẜchu Ꞩirrdi
und Mutt ẜatʒiet : Jebſche eß ſtaighaju tumbẜà Packallneh /
tomaͤhr eß Nhelaim nhe bieſtohß / aiſto tu Kungs eſẜi py
mann / Taws Kohx unnd Sißlis eepreeʒina mann . Ap-
ẜuhds toͤw taß Waͤls ; Redſi CHRJSTVS JESVS
taß labbs Ghanns / ẜehſch py Deewa ẜawa Taͤhwa labbu
Rohku /
Rohku / unnd muhſẜo dehļ runna : Ja tad kaß labban
muhſẜo ſtarrpà ghraͤko / tad gir mums weens Aisbill-
daͤtais py Taͤhwu / JESVS Chriſt / katters taißnis gir .
Kad taß Ghanns Dawids ẜawas Ahwis ghannija / nahʒe weens
Lawis und Lahʒis / unnd neſẜe weenu Ahwi nohſt ; Bett Da-
wids tetʒeja tam pehtʒ / und ẜitta to / und peſtija to Ahwi / no win-
ja Muttes / und nokahwe to Lawi und to Lahʒi . Jhten ta
mums arridſan daſch⸗reis noteek ; Lawes / plehſẜighi Swaͤhri /
unnd Lahtſchi us mums ẜoͤw mahʒahß / nickni Ļaudis / kattri
mums und muhſẜo Nabbadſibu ghribb apriet ; Tomaͤhr nhe
buhß mums wißkim ißtruhʒenateeß / neds iſẜamiſt : aiſto JEſus
Chriſtus muhſẜo labbs Ghanns / to wiß ghann raͤds / Wings py
mums ſtahwehß / unnd mums pahrſtahwehß . Klauſẜaita ka
Wings patʒ mums ee⸗preeʒina ẜatʒidams : Eß ghribbu juhß
naͤſẜaht lieds patt waͤtʒumà / und kamaͤhr juhß ẜirrmi tap-
ẜeeta / eß ghribbu to darriet / eß ghribbu juhß ʒillaht / und
neſt / und atpeſtiet .
Daſẜch ẜawus Sohbus gir trinnis us muhſẜu Nabbadſi-
bu / und us ẜchahß Semmes :
Mehß buhtam ka Straumeh apẜliekuſchi /
Vnd par kattreems leels Vhdens taͤck /
Vnd ar leelu Warru nogrimmuẜchi : Bett
Deewam gir Ꞩlawa und Teickſchana kaß nhe dewe
Waļļu /
Ka winjo Rihklei mums by ẜaghrahpt /
Ka kahß Puttnis no ſlaßdu iß⸗ſkrey /
Ta gir muhſẜo Dwehſẜele ißbaͤhghuſẜi /
Taß Wallgs gir puſẜchu / und mehs aͤſẜam ſwabbadi /
Ta Kungha Wahrds ſtahw mums klaht /
Ta Deewa wirſẜon Debbes und Semmes .
Kaß
Kaß tad nu / to abdohmadams nhe ghribbaͤtu ẜatʒiet / ka JE-
ſus Chriſtus weens labbs ghanns gir / aiſto wings pahrſtahw ẜa-
was Ahwis .
Wehl leek Wings mums ẜawu labbumu redſeht eekſchan
to / ka Wings tick ẜirrdighe par mums ghahda . Weens ẜad-
daͤraͤhtʒ Ghanns nhe ohla tahß Ahwis : Eß ẜacka Chriſtus /
aͤßmu weens labbs Ghanns . Daſẜch nhe⸗labbs ghanns nhe
baͤhda wiß tahß Ahwis / tam tahß nhe warr ustitʒeht / Wings nhe
baͤhda / jeb tahms Ahweems ghanniba gir / jeb nhe gir . Bett weens
labbs ghanns dſaͤnn ẜawas Ahwis us tahdu ghannibu / kur labba
tauka ẜmallka Sahle / kur ta Abohļa⸗ſahle augh / aiſto tahda Sah-
le tahms Ahweens gharrda und labba Sahle gir . Jhten tahdu
ghahdigu ẜirrdi tur Jeſus Chriſtus arridſan preett wiſẜeems / kattri-
tam ẜoͤw paļaujahß / wings gahda par teems / ka teems jo nhenee-
ka nhe truhxt . Ꞩchiß taws Ghanns Chriſtus Jeſus iß⸗waͤdd toͤw
ickdeenas / py tawu Deewu / py to attrohd tu tawu barribu / ka tu
tawu Meſẜu warri usturreht . Kad tu ka kahds iß⸗alltʒis Jehrings
tawu Ballxni paʒell / no ẜirrds dibben ẜautʒ und ẜacki : Ock muhſ-
ẜo Taͤhws eekſchan Daͤbbaͤſẜu / Muhſẜu deeniſchku Mais
dohd mums ẜchodeen / unnd wiß kaß mums waijagha gir py
muhſẜas Meeſẜas usturreẜchanas ; tad Wings attweŗŗ ẜawas
Rohkas / und pee⸗aͤhdina wiſẜus kattri dſiewo ar labbu
Prahtu . Deews dohß jums Liegsdà Mais / und baͤh-
dohß Vhdeni / ẜacka taß Proweets Eſaias ; Vnd taß Konings
Dawids ẜacka : Eß aͤßmu jauns bijis / und waͤtʒ tappis / und
muhſcham nhe aͤßmu eß redſejis / to Taißnu attſtahtu /
neds winja Ꞩaͤhklu Mais mecklejam . Jo Deews gir tohß
Baͤhrnus Jſrael / ka ẜawas Ahwis Tuxneſẜy ghannijis / und tohß
tſchetter⸗deßmittus ghaddus lieds pillam usturrejis und pee⸗aͤh-
denajis . Mais Wings teems no Daͤbbaͤſẜu dehwe / und Vhde-
ni licka wings no Ackmiņeems iß⸗tetʒeht .
Ghrib-
Ghribbi tu / O Deewa Ahwis / ehſt unnd dſerrt no Deewa
Schaͤlaſtibas und Eepreeʒenaẜchanas ? Redſi / JEſus Chriſtus
taws labbs Ghanns waͤdd toͤw tanny wetà kur tu attrrohd tawas
Dwehſẜeles ghannibu . Ꞩchi ghanniba gir Deewa Wahrds /
taß gir weens Wahrds tahß Dſiewibas / und tam Wahr-
dam gir tahds ſpaͤhx / ka taß warr ẜwaͤhtu darriet wiſẜus
kattri tam titʒ . Dſirrdi / Manns Draugs / ka Wings toͤw und
ick⸗kattru no mums ar mieligheems Wahrdeems aitʒina / ẜatʒi-
dams : Wiſẜi kattri juhß iß⸗twiekuẜchi eſẜeeta / nahʒeeta
ẜchurr py Vhdeni / und kattreems Nauda nhe gir / nahʒee-
ta ẜchurr / pirrʒeeta und ehdeeta / nahʒeeta ẜchurr / unnd
pirrʒeeta beß Naudas und wellte / tick lieds Peenu ka Wie-
nu . Nahʒeeta ẜchurr py mann / wiſẜi kattri juhß nobaͤh-
dajuſẜchees und abghrutenati eſẜeeta / Eß ghribbu jums
atſpirrdſenaht / und eepreeʒenaht / Ꞩchi barriba gir tick krahß-
na / tick ẜmegkigha / tick jauka / ka mehß warram leelohß baͤhdohß
buhdami ẜatʒiet : Ock Deews Kungs / nhe buhtu taws
Wahrds man epreeʒenajis / eß buhtu baddu mirris man-
nà Nhelaimeh . Jo CHriſtus JEſus patʒ ẜacka : Taß Ʒillwaͤhx
nhe dſiewo ween no tahß Maiſes / bett no ick⸗kattru Wahr-
du / katters ʒaur Deewa Muttes eet . Nu / Mans Draugs /
nheneeka nhe warr toͤw wairahk ee⸗ſtipprenaht / drohſchu ẜirrdi
darriet / unnd gharrdake ẜmeckeht / ka ta barriba / kad Chriſtus
JEſus toͤw ẜcheitan / und kad tu ghraͤkus ey ẜuhdſeht / to Peedo-
ẜchanu wiſẜo tawo ghraͤko leek paẜluddenaht / und ẜawu ſchaͤlaſti-
bu / und to muhſchighu dſiewoẜchanu ee⸗ẜchkinko und dahwena .
Tu warri tu ẜatʒiet / und dſeedaht :
Leetʒ tawam Wahrdam allaſch mannu Barribu
buht /
Ar to mannu Dwehſẜel baŗŗoht /
Ka Eß warru pretti ſtahweht /
Kad
Kad Nhelaimiba us⸗eet /
Kattra mann dries warr no toͤw nowehrſt .
Gir tawa Titʒiba wehl wahja ? Redſi JESVS Chri-
ſtus dſaͤnn toͤw projam / und waͤdd toͤw us ẜawu ſaļļu ghan-
nibu / kur tu attrohd to Barribu tahß Meeſẜas und Aſẜinis tawa
Ghanna und Kungha JESV Chriſti . Aiſto Wings ẜawà
ẜwaͤhtà Wackar⸗aͤhdenà toͤw meelo ar ẜawu dahrghu Meeſ-
ẜu / unnd dſirrdina toͤw ar ẜawu dahrghu Aſẜini / katters iß-
leetʒ gir par peedoẜchanu tawo Ghraͤko . Nu ẜacki tu / Manns
Draugs / O
Kungs tawa leela Mielaͤſtiba toͤw ſpeduſẜi gir /
Ka tawam Aſẜinim py mums by leelu brienumu
darriet /
Vnd nomaxaht muhſẜu Parradu /
Ka nu Deews attkal muhſẜu Draugs gir tappis .
Abdohma nu / O Ʒillwaͤka⸗Baͤhrns / tahdu leelu Mielaͤſti-
bu / und to ſchehlighu ẜirrdi tawa Ghana Chriſti JEſu / und tur-
rais / ka labbai Ahwei pee⸗klahjahß . Juhß ſinnaht paſẜchi / ka Ah-
wis ẜoͤw paſẜchu nhe warr wallditeeß / tam ghannam buhß to wall-
diet / unnd ghlabboht ; dſiewo ta Ahwis / tad dſiewo ta ẜawam
Ꞩaimneekam / mirrſt ta / tad mirrſt ta ẜawam Ꞩaimneekam : Jh-
ten ta / muhſẜo Dwehſẜele pee⸗daͤrr JEſu Chriſto muhſẜam lab-
bam Ghannam . Dſiewojam mehß / tad dſiewojam mehß
tam Kungham / mirrſtam mehß / tad mirrſtam mehß tam
Kungham / mehß dſiewojam jeb mirrſtam / tad pee⸗daͤr-
ram mehß tam Kungham / aiſto Wings gir mums attpirr-
ʒeeß / ka mehß buhtam Ahwis ẜawas ghannibas .
Weena Ahwis dſirrd dries / kad paſieſtams Ghanns to ẜautʒ .
Tu Ʒillwaͤka Baͤhrns / katters tu eſẜi weena Ahwis JEſu Chri-
ſti / kad taws Ghanns ʒaur to Mutt tawa Mahʒetaja toͤw ẜautʒ /
atgreeſees no Ghraͤkeems / eſẜeeta ſchehlighi / ihten ka juhſẜo
Taͤhws
Taͤhws ſchehliegs gir / peedohdeeta / tad tapps jums pee-
dohtʒ ; Kaß nu weena Ahwis Chriſti JEſu gir / tam gir arridſan
ſkaņņas Auſẜis / und darra ko taß labbs Ghanns ghribb .
Weena Ahwis nhe kahpele auxte / ka Kaſa / bett palleek py
Semmes . Tu / Mans Baͤhrns / nhe kahpele tu par leeku / nhe
ghahda pehtʒ kahdu auxtaku ghohdu / und nhe dohma par
tawu Warru / bett ko Deews toͤw pawehlejis gir / us to tu
allaſchien dohma .
Weena Ahwis pee⸗aͤhdahß laͤhte ; mett winjai weenu ẜaujiņ-
ņu Ꞩeenu preekſcha / jeb dohd tai kummoẜiņņu Mais / winja pal-
leek ar Meeru : Tu Manns Draugs / dohdeeß ar Meeru / kad
Deews toͤw irr kummoẜiņņu Maiſes dohd / unnd wiß ko wings
toͤw ißdalla . Bieſti tu Deewu / und jemm ar to par labbu / ko
toͤw Deews dohd / taß toͤw gir leela Pretʒe .
Weena Ahwis gir lehniga / ta nhe ſpeŗŗ ka weens Sirrgs /
ta nhe rey ka Ꞩunniß / ta nhe plehẜch ka Kagkis / bett tu warri ar
Ahwi darriet / ka tow paſẜcham patiek . Eſẜi tu arridſan JESV
Chriſti Ahwis / tad tu arridſan buhſẜi lehniegs und pa⸗ʒeetiegs / ar
labbu Prahtu ẜajembẜi tu to ko toͤw taws ghanns usleek / ẜitt toͤw
taws Ghanns ar ẜawu ſiſlu / tad tu ẜatʒieſẜi ar to ẜwaͤhtu Dawid :
O Kungs / taß mann labb darra / ka tu mann pahrmahʒi-
jis eſẜi / ka eß tawu Mahʒibu mahʒitu .
Weena Ahwis lapraht laiſa Ꞩahli{Sahli} : ta buhß toͤw / ka JE-
ſu Chriſti Ahwei peeklajahß tawu Mehl und tawus Wahrdus
ẜahliet ar to Ꞩahli tha ghohda und kauna / ka mums taß ẜwaͤhtʒ
Apuſtuls Pahwils mahʒa / ẜatʒidams : juhſẜu Wallodu leetʒee-
ta allaſchien mielighu buht / und ar ẜahli ẜahlitu .
Weena Ahwis labbe ẜadaͤrahß / nhe baddahß ar ʒittahms /
ka tee Ahſchi darra ; ta buhß mums ar muhſẜu Kaimiņu lab-
be ẜaderrehteeß / nhe bahrteeß / nhe ſtumbteeß / nhe kauteeß
nhe
nhe badditeeß . Aiſto py to ʒitti ghohdighi Ļaudis juhß pa-
ſieß / ka juhß JEſu Chriſti Mahʒekļi eſẜeeta / ja juhß juhſẜo
ſtarrpà weens ohtru mieļohſẜeeta .
Weena Ahwis ghraͤmmo / ko ta peepehſch aͤhduſẜi gir :
Mums buhß arridſan to Dwehſẜeles⸗barribu / kattru mehs pee-
pehſch aͤſẜam aͤhduẜchi und Baſniʒà buhdami uslaſẜijuẜchi ghraͤm-
moht / und labbe muhſẜà ẜirrdy paturreht / no Deewa Wahrdu irr
Mahjahß / jeb darrbohß buhdami labpraht runnaht . Ta ta Jum-
prawa Maria wiſẜus Wahrdus paturreja ẜawà ẜirrdy .
Weena Ahwis dauds labb darra / ar Willu und ar ẜawu
Ahdu winja mums ghehrb / unnd ẜillda / ar ẜawu Meeſẜu winja
mums pee⸗aͤhdena / ar ẜawu Ꞩuhdu winja to Tierumu tauku
darra / karrſtumà⸗ẜaͤhrghà Awja⸗Ꞩuhdi dauds labb darra : Ta
buhß mums wiſẜur / unnd wiſẜeems Ʒillwaͤkeems labb darriet .
Labb tam / kaß tam pallieds / kam waijagha gir / Deews to
ghlabbohß / und dſiewu usturrehß / unnd lix tam labbe
klahteeß wirrß Semmes .
Weena Ahwis kad ta ghribb apghullteeß / tad kriet ta us
ʒeļļeems / ghribb ta attkall ʒellteeß / tad attkal ta ʒeļļohß maͤttahß .
To darri tu arridſan Mans Draugs / ghulleht eedams jeb ʒaͤll-
dameeß kritt tu us taweems ʒeļļeems / luhds Deewu / ka Wings
toͤw ghribbaͤtu Waddiet unnd pallidſeht / tawus Ghraͤkus pee-
doht / und pehtʒ no ẜchahß Warrgo⸗Semmes usjembt eekſchan
to muhſchighu Dſiewoẜchanu . To dohd jums und mann /
Deews taß Taͤhws / Daͤhls und ẜwaͤhtʒ Gharrs /
AMEN .
Evan-
Evangelium am Sontage
Iubilate, Johann. 16.
To ẜwaͤhtu Ewangelium no to Deewa bijatajo und Chri-
ſtito Ļauẜcho Nhelaim / kattra tomaͤhr illghe nhe
ſtahw / bett ar to muhſchig⸗palleekamu Liexmibu und
Preeku pahrmieta tohp / apraxta taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewange-
liſts Jahnis ẜawà Ghramatà tan ẜaͤſta⸗padeßmittan wee-
tan / und ſkann tee Wahrdi juhſẜà Wallodà tha :
JEſus ẜatʒija us ẜaweems
Mahʒekļeems : Par weenu maſu
briedi / tad juhß mann nhe redſeſ-
ẜeeta / und attkal par weenu maſu
briedi / tad juhß mann redſeſẜeeta /
Aiſto eß eemu py Taͤhwu . Tad
ẜatʒija
ẜatʒija ʒitti no winja Mahʒekļeem ẜawà ſtarrpà : Kaß
gir taß / ka taß us mums ẜacka / par weenu maſu brie-
di / tad juhß mann nhe redſeeſẜeeta / und attkal par
weenu maſu briedi tad juhß mann redſeſẜeeta / und
ka es py Taͤhwu eemu ? Tad ẜatʒija tee / kaß gir taß /
ka taß ẜacka / par weenu maſu briedi ? Mehß nhe ſin-
nam / ko taß runna . Tad nomannija Jeſus / ka tee tam
ghribbeja jautaht / und ẜatʒija us teem : Par to juhß
apjautateeß juhſẜo ſtarrpà / ka eß ẜatʒijis aͤßmu / par
weenu maſu briedi / tad juhß mann nhe redſeſẜeeta /
unnd attkal par weenu maſu briedi / tad juhß mann
redſeſẜeeta . Pattees / pattees / eß ẜacku jums / juhß rau-
dahſẜeeta und kaukẜeeta / bett tha Paſẜaule preeʒahſ-
ẜees . Bett juhß buhſẜeeta noſkummuſẜchi . Bett
juhſẜai Noſkumſchanai buhß par Preeku tapt .
Weena Ꞩeewa / kad ta waͤddahß / tad gir ta no-
ſkummuſẜi / Aiſto winjas Stunda gir daggajuſẜi .
Bett kad tha to Baͤhrnu peedſimmuſẜi gir / tad nhe
peeminn ta wairs tahß ẜahpes / tahß liexmibas dehļ /
ka taß Ʒillwaͤhx eekſchan tahß Paſẜaules peedſim-
mis gir . Vnd juhß arridſan eſẜeeta noſkummuſchi /
bett eß ghribbu juhß attkal redſeht / und juhſẜa Ꞩirrds
liexmohſẜees / unnd juhſẜu liexmibu nhe buhß nhe wee-
nam no jums attjembt . Vnd tanny paſẜchà Deenà
juhß mann nheneeka jautahſẜeeta .
Ꞩchiß
ꞨChiß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewangeliums peedaͤrr pirr-
majan kahrtan eekſchan to ohtru Lohʒekļi muhſẜas
ẜwaͤhtas Titʒibas / kur mehs ta ẜackam : Eß titʒu
eekſchan JEſum Chriſtum Deewa weenighu
Daͤhlu / muhſẜu Kunghu / katters gir ʒeetis ap-
packſchan Pontio Pilato / Kruſtà ẜiſts / nomirris und ap-
rackts / treſẜchà Deenà attkal aukſcham ʒehleeß no teems
Mirroņeems . Aiſto ẜcheitan JEſus Chriſtus ẜacka ẜaweems
Mahʒekļeems / ka par weenu maſu Briedi tee to nhe redſehß / taß
gir : wings ʒeetieß leelas Mohkas und ẜahpes / kļuhß ẜiſts / kullts /
ẜchauſts / neewahts / apmehdiets / iß⸗ẜunniets / pehtʒ wißkim py
Kruſta kohku ẜiſts / nokautʒ / the wings mirrs / kļuhß apracktʒ / trieß
Deenas und Nacktis pallix Wings eekſchan Semmes / und tan-
ny briedy tee Mahʒekļi to nhe redſehß : bett attkal par weenu ma-
ſu briedi / tad juhß mann redſeſẜeeta / ẜacka Chriſtus JEſus / taß
gir : kad Eß treſẜchà Deenà attkal aukſcham ʒellẜchohß no teems
Mirroņeems / tad eß ẜoͤw jums rahdiẜchohß / juhß mann attkal
redſeſẜeeta ar juhſẜeems Atʒeems / eß ar jums / unnd juhß ar mann
runnaſẜeeta / und juhß no ẜirrds ee⸗preeʒenaẜeteeß / und buhẜeeta
liexmi / par to ka juhß mann attkal redſejuẜchi eſẜeeta . Bett ih-
ten ka JEſus Chriſtus Jeſus muhſẜo Kungs und ghallwa muhſ-
ẜo Ghraͤko dehļ leelas Mohkas und ẜahpes / ja to ruhktu Nahwu
gir ʒeetis / und gir ẜawam Taͤhwam paklauſẜiegs bijis ihs
tai Nahwei / ja ihs tai Nahwei py Kruſtu / unnd gir lab-
praht Deewa ẜawa Daͤbbaͤſẜa Prahtu darrijis ; ihten ta
buhß winja Mahʒekļeems arridſan ẜchinny Paſẜauleh unnd
Warrgho⸗Semmeh dauds Nhelaim redſeht / und ʒeeſt ar Chri-
ſto JEſu / ka tee arridſan lieds winjà ghohdà pa⸗auxtena-
ti tohp . Tapehtʒ peedaͤrr ẜchiß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewangeliums eekſchan
tahß treſẜchahß Luhkẜchanas / kad mehß ta ẜackam : Muhſẜo

ſchan
ſchan Daͤbbaͤſẜu / tha arridſan wirſẜu Semmes . Vnd kad

O Deews Daͤbbaͤſẜo Taͤhws /
Taws Prahtʒ laid noteek / ween lieds /
Wirß Semmes / ka Daͤbbaͤſẜa Wallſtibà /
Dohd mums ʒeeẜchanu behdigà laikà /
Paklauſẜigheems buht labbà und ļauna Deenà /
Stahw prettib wiſẜu Meeſẜu und Aſẜini /
Katters prett tawu Prahtu darra .
Vnd tad pehdighe buhß mums ee⸗preeʒenateeß ar to / ka JE-

Laideeta mums apdohmaht und mahʒiteeß / kapehtʒ muhſ-
ẜa Nhelaime und Baͤdas weens maß brieds tohp daͤhwaͤ-
tas / kattras baͤhdas patʒ Deews mums peẜuhta / und tahß
ʒeeßdami mehß ghann Aſẜaras pillinajam und kautʒam .
JEſus Chriſtus dohd mums ẜawu ẜwaͤhtu Gharru / ka mehß
ẜcho Mahʒibu labbe waͤhrà jaͤmmam / unnd muhſẜà Nhelaimeh /

Man-
MAnni mieļi Draughi / Muhſẜa Nhelaime unnd Baͤhdas /
kattras Deews pehtʒ ẜawu ſchehlighu Prahtu mums pee-
ẜuhta / jebſche tada Nhelaime preekſch muhſẜahms Atʒeems
ghann illge ſtahw / tomaͤhr gir ta tickai maß Brieds / kad mehß
abdomajam / tahß Mohkas und to ẜuhru ʒeeẜchanu muhſẜa Kun-
gha JESV CHRJſti / no kattras Wings ẜcheitan tha ẜacka :
Par weenu maſu briedi / tad juhß mann nhe redſeſẜeeta .
Wings ghribb tick dauds ẜatʒiet : Manni mieļi Mahʒekļi / par
weenu maſu Brietiņu tapẜchu eß manneems Waideneekeems
nodohtʒ / no jums attrautʒ / unnd py Kruſta⸗Kohku pee⸗nag-

mann attkal redſeſẜeeta / kad Eß buhẜchu no Mirroņeems
aukſcham ʒehleeß / und tapehtʒ buhſẜeeta juhß no Ꞩirrds dibben
liexmi . Abdohma nu / tu Deewa⸗Bijatais / kattram Deews
Nhelaim unnd Baͤhdas gir pee⸗ẜuhtijis / apdohma / ẜacku Eß /
ko taws Kungs und Peſtitais JESVS CHRJSTVS
toͤwis dehļ ʒeetis gir . Jck⸗kattra briedy gir wings ʒeetis . Ai-
ſto Nackty tappa Wings ka kahtʒ Sagglis ghuhſtietʒ / Rieta
aggre apẜuhdſehtʒ / ap treſẜcho Stundu nickna ghohda ẜchauſts /
und ap to ẜaͤſto Stundu py Kruſtu peeẜiſts / ap to dewito Stun-
du gir Wings nomirris / und us Wackaru apracktʒ . Wings
gir ʒeetis wiſẜahß weetahß / kur Wings bija . Eekſchan to
Dahrſu Gethſemane behdſe winja Mahʒekļi nohſt / attſtahja

li apmehdietʒ und apẜmeetʒ / unnd us to Karratawas⸗Kallnu
py Kruſtu peeẜiſts unnd nokautʒ . JESVS CHRJſtus gir

ißleh-

ņeems paſuhdenahtʒ / no Draugheems pee⸗willtʒ / weens attſtahtʒ /

Wieri und Ꞩeewas / Kunghi unh Kallpi / ar weenu Wardu ẜak-

kahrdams braͤhtʒ Wings : Manns Deews / manns Deews /
kapehtʒ eſẜi tu mann atſtahjis ?
Vsluhko nu ẜcheitan / Manns Draugs / tawu Nhelaim /
tawas Ꞩahpes und Mohkas : girrahk tawa Nhelaime tahda

mann ?
mann ? gir Chriſtus JEſus muhſẜo Peſtitais Wiſẜahß Weetahß /

Eß ghribbu to labbu Bickeri jembt / unnd tha Kungha
Wahrdu mahʒiet . Aiſto / kaß JESV Chriſti Mahʒeklis
ghribb buht / tam buhß ẜoͤw paſẜchu aisleekteeß / ẜawu Kru-
ſtu us ẜoͤw jembt unnd JESV Chriſto pehtʒ ſtaighaht .
Redſeeta / tha juhß warreeta praſt / ka juhſẜa Nhelaime maſa leeta
und maß Brieds gir .
Vnd to juhß Deewa⸗Baͤhrni wehl labbahk nomanniſẜee-
ta / kad juhß abdohmahſẜeeta to Pullku juhſẜo ghraͤko . Ꞩchee

tee nhe pratta / ko Chriſtus teems ẜatʒija . Ock Manns

ko . Jck⸗kattram buhß ẜuhdſeht und ẜatʒiet : Eß aͤßmu prett

Ꞩmilltis juhr⸗mally . Aiſto / kaß warr ẜatʒiet / Manna

Mehs wiſẜi lieds aͤſẜam ghreʒeneeki / und mums peetruhxt
ta Leeliba / kattra mums preekſch Deewu waijagha gir /
ẜacka taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils . Vnd
Ja Deews ghribb to usredſeht /
Kaß Ghraͤki und nhe patteeß gir darrietʒ /
Kaß warr tad preekſchan winju pallickt ?
Nu nhe gir nhe weeni Ghraͤki tick maſi / ja tu nhe nopellni
Deewa Dußmighu ẜohdibu / to laiʒighu Nahwu unnd to muh-
ſchighu Paſuſẜchanu . Aiſto / nolahdaͤhtʒ gir taß / kaß nhe pee-
pillda
pillda wiſẜus Wahrdus eekſchan Baußlu / ka taß pehtʒ to
darra / Tam Beßdeewigham buhß mirrt ẜawo Ghraͤko

taß gir ſtrahdajis / kahds Darrbs / tahda Allgha / gir ẜak-
kams Wahrds . Jck⸗kattri Ghraͤki ghruhſch to Ʒillwaͤku

ney Nacktis . Bett kad tu O Ʒillwaͤhx tawus Ghraͤkus ick⸗dee-

CHRJSTJ tawa Peſtitaja puſẜes pehtʒ / Wings attjaͤmm

weenu laiʒighu Pahrmahʒiẜchanu / und ẜacka : Pahrmahʒiet

Kad mehß ẜohditi tohpam / tad tohpam mehß no to Kun-
ghu pahrmahʒiti / ka mehß ar to Paſẜaul nhe tohpam
paſudenati . To nomannija irr Konings Dawid / tapehtʒ
ẜacka Wings : Pirrms eß ſaͤmmohtʒ tappu / alloju eß /

nis / und tawa Teeſẜa gir patteeſẜa / eß ghribbu kluſẜe ʒeeſt /
und mannu Mutt nhe attdarriet / Kungs tu ghann lab-
be darrieſẜi . Negg tu nu / Manns Draugs / nomanni / ka
tawa Nhelaime ihſẜa und maß Brieds gir ?
Maſu
Maſu briedi toͤw ja⸗ʒeeẜch / kad tu apdohma to Palliedſi-
bu tawa Peſtitaja JESV Chriſti / ar kattru Wings toͤw dries

ẜchanai buhß pa⸗Preeku tapt . Ja muhſẜo Kungs JE-
SVS Chriſtus weenu maſu brietiņu preekſch mums ẜoͤw pa-
ẜlepjahß / tad tomaͤhr leekahß Wings ẜoͤw attkal par weenu ma-
ſu Briedi redſeteeß . Schaͤlojeeß tu ar to Koniņu Dawid ! O

toͤw attkal ẜakohpt . Eß ẜawu Waigu eekſchan Atʒa mirrk-
kli tahß Dußmibas magkeniet no toͤw aͤßmu paẜlehpis /
bett ar leelu Schaͤlaſtibu ghribbu Eß ẜoͤw attkal par toͤw
apſchaͤloteeß . Chriſtus JEſus ar mums darra / ka kahda Mahte
ar ẜawu Baͤhrnu jacktaͤdama darra : Winja paſlepjahß packaļ
Krahßni / packaļ ghulltu / jeb packaļ Durrweems / leek to Baͤhr-
nu ẜoͤw meckleht / kad nu taß Baͤhrns to Maht tick dries nhe warr

nings ghann illghe no⸗brehtʒeeß gir / tad nahk ta Mahte preekſcha /

Kruhti ſpeeßdama : ihten ta jackte arridſan ar mums muhſẜo

muhſẜa Mahte mums aismirrſt / tad nhe ghribb Wings

kahß ee⸗ſiemojis {ee ſiemojis } . Wings paẜlepjahß ẜoͤw arridſan preekſchan

mums / kad Wings mums ẜawu Pallidſibu tick dries nhe leek re-

Mahte mums weenus attſtah / tad taß Kungs mums us-

Preeki : Deewa Dußmiba ſtahw weenu Atʒa⸗mirrckli /

arridſan pallids / mums gir weens Deews / katters mums

peſtiet warr . Nhe bahrſẜeeß Wings allaſchien nei muh-
ſcham Wings Dußmu turrehß / und te Taißni tohp mag-
keniet ẜchauſti / bett dauds labb teems notix . Ꞩacki tapehtʒ /

kad
kad taß Baͤhrns dſiews und waͤſẜaͤls peedſimmis gir . Tad pahr-
ẜweŗŗ tee Preeki to Noſkumẜchanu .
Ka gir daſẜch labbs Deewa⸗Baͤhrns ẜawas baͤhdas ʒeetis
ẜeptiņus Ghaddus / ka taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Jobbs / pehtʒ Deews ohter⸗teek
winjam addewe / und dſiewoja Wings labbà Meerà / labbà{labba} Weſ-

me illghe us taweem Kameẜcheem ghull und toͤw ſpeeẜch / luhds

manns Deews / nhe eſẜi tahle no mann / ſteidſeeß man klaht
ſtahweht / Kungs / manna Peſtiẜchana . JEſus Chriſtus
ẜacka / ka weens nhetaißnis Ꞩoghis gir bijis / ko ludſe weena nab-
bagha Attraitne / ka wings ghribbaͤtu tai Teeſẜu doht unnd palli-

nas / und winja ick⸗deenas / ick Stundas / ick briedis tam Ꞩogim
Auſẜis ghulleja / palliedſeja taß tai : Nhe buhtu tad Deews
ẜawus Baͤhrnus peſtiet / kattri Winju peeẜautʒ / Deenas
und Nacktiß ? Ja / ẜacka Chriſtus JEſus Wings tohß peſtieß
weenà maſà briedi .
Maſu Briedi toͤw ja⸗ʒeeẜch / kad tu apdohma / ka tawa Dſie-
wiba peepehſch und dries ais⸗eet . Jo tu eſẜi Ʒillwaͤhx / no Ꞩee-
was us ẜchahß Paſẜaules pee⸗dſimbts / ka JEſus Chriſtus
ẜcheitan runna . Negg tad nu weens Ʒillwaͤhx gir weena waja
leeta ? ta Ʒillwaͤka Dſiewiba gir ka kahda aͤhna / und illghe
nhe palleek / ka kahds Wehẜch / unnd ka Ꞩallna und Mig-
gla / kattra no tahß{to} Ꞩaules{Ꞩaul} tohp iß⸗daͤldaͤta / muhſẜa Dſiewiba
gir preekſchan Deewu ka Plauxta plattums / wiſẜi Ʒillwaͤ-
ki gir ka nheneeka / mehß wiſẜi ẜahwieſtam ka Lappas Rud-
deny .
Pirrmajohß laikohß dſiewoja tee Ļaudis Peetʒ⸗ẜehẜch⸗ẜimb-
tus
tus ghaddus / unnd wairahk / bett nu / kad Ʒillwaͤhx illghe dſie-
wo / tad tohp Wings ẜepting⸗deßmittis Ghaddus / unnd
ja taß itt waͤtʒ tohp / tad dſiewo Wings aßtoņus⸗deßmit-
tis ghaddus . Vnd no ẜimbteems Ʒillwaͤkeems nhe deßmitts
wehl tick waͤtʒ tohp . Kad nu Mans Draugs / tawas Deenas
pa ghallam / tad arridſan tawas baͤhdas und tawa Nhelaime pa
ghallam . Eſẜi tu Nabbags und pills Nheweſẜelibas ka Laʒarus /
und buhß toͤw ar Siſlu waſateeß / tick illghe tu dſiewo ; dohdeeß
ar Meeru / Manns Baͤhrns / par weenu maſu Briedi taps
labbahx . JEſus Chriſtus taws Kungs unnd Peſtitais toͤw no
wiſẜas Nhelaimibas attpeſtieß ʒaur wenu ſchehlighu Stundiņu .
Kad tu eekſchan ihſtaͤnas Titʒibas us tawu Kunghu Chriſtum
JEſum mirrſti / tad gir tawa Nomirrẜchana weena Attpeſtiẜcha-
na no wiſẜas Nhelaimes⸗Ꞩaitehms / und ihten ka kahds Sirrgs
jeb Wehrſẜis no ẜawu Darrbu / no Arrcklu / jeb Ratteem{Rattu} iß⸗juhktʒ
tohp / ka taß attkal warr attpuhſteeß ; ihten ta arridſan tu Dee-
wa⸗Baͤhrns / ʒaur tawu Nahwu tohpi iß⸗juhkts no to Juhghu
tawas Nhelaimes / Ꞩaͤhrghas und Baͤhdas . Tu noleetʒ no ta-
weems Kammeſẜeems to ghruhtu Naßtu / ar kattru tu eſẜi waſa-
jeeß / wiſẜu tawu Muhſchu . Vnd tapehtʒ tawa Muggura itt
lieka gir tappuſẜi . Nomirris / buſẜi tu no wiſẜu Darrbu / und
ʒaur to Nawu ey tu eekſchan tahs Dſiwibas / tu ey eekſchan
to Nammu / katters nhe gir ar Rohkahms darriets / bett
katters muhſchighe gir Debbeſẜies . Turr eſẜi tu Meerà / uñ
tophi ee⸗preeʒenahtʒ / nhe buhſẜi tu turr wairs iß⸗altʒis ney
iß⸗twieʒis / nhe krittieß us toͤw ta Ꞩaule / nei kahds Karr-
ſtums / aiſto taß Jaͤhrs ( JEſus Chriſtus ) kraͤhßla widdu
ganna und wadda toͤw py to dſiewu Ahwotu / und Deews
noẜlauka wiſẜas Aſẜaras no tawu Waighu / no taweems
Atʒeems .
Abdohma wehl / Manns Draugs / to leelu unnd muhſchi-
ghu
ghu Preeku / kattru toͤw Deews winja Paſẜauleh dohß / Chriſtus
JEſus eekſchan ẜcho Ewangelio ta ẜacka : Eß ghribbu juhß at-
kal redſeht / und juhſẜa Ꞩirrds liexmohſẜeeß / und juhſẜu liex-
mibu nhe buhß nhe weenam no jums attjembt . Taggad
ſchinny Warrgho⸗Semmeh / aͤſẜam mehß pilli Aſẜaro / tohß buhß
daſcham rittinaht ; bett JEſus Chriſtus weddieß toͤw ẜawà Pree-
kà / und jaukà Nammà . Debbeſẜieß preeʒaſẜeeß tu itt ihſtaͤne / ih-
ten ka kahda Ꞩeewinņa preeʒajahß / kad Deews winjai weenu
waͤſẜaͤlu Auglu dehwis gir . Tee kattri ar Aſẜarahms ẜehje /
tee pļauß liexmodammeeß . ( ghawillaͤdami . ) Tee Deewa⸗
Kallpi no labbu Prahtu ghawilehß / und juhß kattri juhß
taggad weenu maſu briedi noſkummuẜchi eſẜeeta daſcha-
dà Liegßdà / juhß preeʒaſẜeeteeß ar ẜirrdighu Preeku / kat-
tru nhe kahda Mehle warr ißrunnaht . Tu preeʒaſẜeeß Deb-
beſẜieß lieds pillam / unnd no wiſẜas ẜirrds / muhſchighe / nhe kah-
das baͤhdas tawu Liexmibu no toͤw attjembs . Ꞩchinny Paſẜau-
leh daſẜch Ʒillwaͤhx leekahß liexmis aͤſẜohtʒ / bett ta Ꞩirrds ruhxt
winjam no leelahms Baͤhdahms / kauna dehļ / nhe drieſt raudaht :
Bett turr tawa Ꞩirrds preeʒahſẜeeß / Aiſto winja Paſẜauleh
nhe taps dſirrdaͤta ta Ballxne tahß Raudaẜchanas / neds
ta Ballſẜa tahß Schaͤloẜchannas / Turr nhe kahda ļaun
mums notix / neds kahda Ꞩaͤhrgha py muhſẜahms Buh-
dahms peeſtahß . Winjà Paſẜauleh nhe buhß ja⸗bieſtahß / kad
tu ghann illghe buhſẜi preeʒajeeß / tad attkal ta Deena nahx / kad
toͤw buhß ja⸗puhſchļa / und ja⸗baͤhdajahß : ka ta ẜwaͤhta Jobb
Baͤrni / tee by liexmi / bett taß Namms itt nhe ſiņņoht teems kļua
us Packauſẜi maͤſts .
Par wiſẜahms leetahms jemmeeta to waͤhrà / ka tee Beß-
deewighi paſẜchà ẜawà leelà Preekà noſkummuẜchi tohp .
Daſẜch Plieteneex / py ẜawu Klappi liexmodammeeß / ee-
ẜahk ar ʒittu bahrteeß / bahrdambs ißrau Naſi / nodurr
to
to ohtru . Teh gir taß Preex pahrwaͤhrſts leelà Noſkum-
ẜchanà .
Daſẜch ar Branda⸗wienu apdſehreeß / kriet ſemmeh / pirr-
mahk leelohß Liexmohß bijis / und iß⸗ſteepjahß ar leelahms Moh-
kahms / mirrſt ka Wehrſẜis . Konings Belſaʒer by pee⸗dſehreeß
und ļohte liexmis / to Nackti tappa Wings nokautʒ . Taß bag-
gahtʒ Plieteneex ick⸗deenas dſiewoja Kahrumà und Liexmibà ; bett
kad taß Mallʒings paſẜchà gharrdumà no⸗ẜlieda / tad noẜlieda
winja Dwehſẜele Elles dibbinà .
Bett toͤw / O Deewa⸗Baͤhrnam / buhß pehtʒ ẜcho Laiku
Ar Chriſto taß muhſchiegs Preex /
Vs to buhß toͤw dohmaht /
Vnd to Preeku nhe weens nhe attjembs no toͤw . Teitan tu
dſeedahſẜi ar to ẜwaͤhtu Koninju Dawid ; Kungs tu eſẜi man-
nu Schaͤloẜchannu pahrwehrtis eekſchan Dantʒoẜchanu /
Tu eſẜi mannu Maiſẜu ißwillʒis / unnd mann attkal ar
Liexmibu abjohẜieß . Tee Taißni dabbuis weenu krahßnu
Wallſtu .
Nhe weens Ʒillwaͤhx nhe dſiewo kaß iſẜatʒiet warr /
To Ghohdu und to muhſchighu Allghu /
Kattru taß Kungs mums dahwenahß .
Tawa Nhelaime weenu maſu briedi ſtahw / kad tu turr
prettie abdohma to Preeku und Lixmibu / kattra us tawu Baͤhdu
nahx . Tawa Nhelaime gir laiʒigha / bett taws Preex buhß
muhſchiegs . Taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils ẜacka : Eß titʒu /
ka ſchie laiʒigha Ʒeeẜchana nhe attmaxa to Ghohdibu / kat-
tru mums redſighe dabbuit buhß .
Vnd ihten ka weena Ꞩeewinja Liexmojahß / kad ta weenu
Ʒillwaͤku peedſimmuſẜi gir / und tahdu Behrniņu ar kattru winja
pehtʒ warr jackteht meeßloht unnd ẜmaidiet / katters Mahtei da-
ſchu
ſchu Ꞩmeeklu padara ; ihten ta tu arridſan winjà Paſẜauleh
liexmoſẜeeß / kad tu redſehſẜi / ka tawa Meeſẜa liedſaͤna gir tai
apſkaidrotai Meeſẜi JESV Chriſti / tu preeʒahſẜeeß / kad tu
turr ar Deewu / ar wiſẜeems ẜwaͤhteems Engeļeems unnd wiſ-
ẜeems Deewa⸗Baͤhrneems muhſchighà Mielaͤſtibà und Drau-
dſeh pallickẜi / kad tu Deewu redſehſẜi tawà Meeſẜà / to tu
toͤw redſehſẜi / und tawas Atʒis to redſehß / Aiſto mehß turr
beß mitteẜchanas py to Kunghu buhſẜim / Turr pallidſa
mums Deews taß Taͤhws / Daͤhls und ẜwaͤhtʒ Gharrs / ta ẜwaͤh-
ta Triaidiba / ẜlahwaͤta und ghohdaͤta no mums ẜcheit laiʒighe
und turr muhſchighe / Amen / Amen / Amen .
Evangelium am Sontage
Cantate , Johan. 16.
To ẜwaͤhtu Ewangelium / ka JESVS Chriſtus ẜawus
Mahʒekļus eepreeʒena / ka teem Drohſchu Ꞩirrdi
turreht buhß / jebſche Wings no teem nohſt eet py
Taͤhwu / apraxta taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewangeliſts Jahnis ẜawà
Ghramatà ẜaͤſtà⸗pa⸗deßmità Weetà{Wetà} / und ſkann tee Wahr-
di juhſẜà Wallodà tha :
JEſus
JEſus ẜatʒija us ẜaweem
Mahʒekļeem : Nu no⸗eemu eß py
to / kaß mann ẜuhtijis gir / unnd
nhe weens ſtarrpan jums jautha
mann / kur tu noeeẜi ? Bett tadehļ /
ka eß to us jums runnajis aͤßmu /
gir juhſẜa Ꞩirrds pilla noſkumſchanas tappuſẜi :
Bett eß ẜacku jums to teeſcham / Taß gir jums labb /
ka eß no⸗eemu . Aiſto ja eß nhe no⸗eemu / tad nhe
nahk taß Eepreeʒenatais py jums . Bett ja eß no-
eemu / tad ghribbu eß to jums ẜuhtiet / Vnd kad taß
patʒ nahk / taß to Paſẜaul ẜohdies / par teem Ghraͤ-
keem / par to Taißnibu / unnd par to Ꞩohdu . Par
teem Ghraͤkeem / ka tee eekſchan mann nhe titʒ . Bett
par to Taißnibu / ka eß py Taͤhwu eemu / unnd juhß
mann
mann joprohjam wairs nhe redſeſẜeta . Par to Ꞩoh-
du / ka taß Kungs ſchahß Paſẜaules noteeſẜahtʒ gir .
Mann gir jums wehl dauds ja⸗ẜacka / bett juhß nhe
warreta to taggad paneſt / bett kad wings taß Gharrs
tahß Taißnibas nahx / taß jums wiſẜenadà Taißnibà
waddieß . Aiſto taß no ẜoͤw paſẜcham nhe runnahß /
bett ko taß dſirrdehß / to taß runnahß / und nakoſchus
leetas taß jums paſluddenahß . Taß patʒ man apſkai-
drohß / Aiſto no manneem Wahrdeem taß jems / und
jums paſluddenahß . Wiß kaß tam Taͤhwam gir / taß
peedaͤrr mann / tapehtʒ aͤßmu eß ẜatʒijis / taß no man-
neem Wahrdeem jems / und jums paſluddenahß .
MJeļi Draughi / nhe wellte mehß to ẜwaͤh-
tu Gharru / pee⸗luhdſam / ẜatʒidammi :
Tu ẜwaͤhtʒ Ghaiẜchums / ʒeniegs Palliegs /
Laid mums ſpiedeht tahß Dſiwibas Wahr-
du / Vnd mahʒi mums Deewu patteeſẜe attſiet /
No Ꞩirrds to Taͤhwu ẜaukt :
O Kungs paſẜarrghi mums par ẜweſẜchu Mahʒibu /
Ka mehs ʒittu Mahʒetaju nhe mecklejam wairs /
Ka JEſum Chriſtum ar patteeſẜu Titʒibu /
Vnd us to no Ꞩirrds palaiſchameeß .
Aiſto ar ẜcho Luhkſchanu luhdſam mehß to Ꞩwaͤhtu Ghar-
ru / taß ghribbaͤtu muhſẜas Ꞩirrdes walldiet / ka mehß nhe klauſ-
ẜam nheticklus Mahʒetajus / kattri mums nhe mahʒa Deewa
Wahrdu / bett ẜawu paſẜchu Mahʒibu mellſch / und tahda Ʒillwaͤ-
ʒigha Mahʒiba muhſẜu noſkumÞuẜchu Ꞩirrdi nhe warr ee⸗preeʒe-
naht . Bett ka mehß to Kunghu Jeſum par muhſẜu ihſtaͤnu Mah-
ʒetaju usjaͤmmam / winja Wahrdam titʒam / aiſto Winjam
gir
gir Wahrdi tahß Dſiewibas / Winjam ißmahʒita Mehle /
Wings ſinna / ar apkuſẜuẜcheem / taß gir / ar noſkummuſcheem
Ʒillwaͤkeem paſẜchà Laikà runnaht / unnd tohß eepreeʒenaht .
Muhſcham nhe weens Ʒillwaͤhx tha gir mahʒijis / ka taß
Kungs JESVS . Kaß ghribbaͤtu tad nu ʒittu Mahʒetaju
meckleht ?
To nomannija tee Mahʒekļi tha Kungha JEſu Chriſti /
ẜawà Laikà : wiß wairahk tad / kad taß Laix daggaja / kad tam
Kungham JESV ʒaur to Nahwu tha Kruſta⸗Kohka / kattru
Wings muhſẜo dehļ ʒeete / py ẜawu Taͤhwu by eet . Aiſto kad
Wings ẜacka : Nu no⸗eemu{noee⸗mu} eß py to / kaß mann ẜuhtijis gir ;
tad to Mahʒekļo Ꞩirrdes tohp pillas noſkummẜchanas .
Teita nu taß Kungs JEſus tohß attkal ee⸗preeʒena / ẜohlidams /
Wings ghribbohtʒ teem ẜuhtiet to ẜwaͤhtu Gharru / par
Eepreeʒenataju / und par Mahʒetaju / taß tohß wiſẜenadà
Taißnibà waddieß . JEſus Chriſtus mahʒa ẜawus Mahʒe-
kļus / teem buhß drohẜchu Ꞩirrdi turreht / und nhe baͤhdateeß / ka
Wings py Taͤhwu eet : Aiſto ẜchi No⸗eeẜchana teem par
labb nahkahß . Tee taps ʒaur JEſu Chriſti Mohkahm / Aſẜi-
no⸗Jßleeẜchanu / und Nahwu no Ghraͤkeem / no Deewa Dußmi-
bas / unnd no muhſchighas Paſuſẜchanas attpeſtieti . Mehß
ghribbam aran ẜcho Ꞩwaͤhtu Ewangelio mahʒiteeß / ka JEſus
Chriſtus ẜaweem Mahʒekļeem drohẜchu Ꞩirrdi darra /
teem ẜohlidams / to Eepreeʒetaju / to Ꞩwaͤhtu Gharru .
Mehß luhdſam to paſẜchu Ꞩwaͤhtu Gharru / taß ghribbaͤ-
tu mums wiſẜenadà Taißnibà weſt / ẜoͤw paſẜcham par Ghohdu /
und mums par Labbu / Amen .
MJeļi Draughi / taß Kungs JEſus Chriſtus gir trieß Rei-
ſas ſtippre ghahjis / ween Reis nahʒe Wings no Daͤbbaͤſ-
ẜu / unnd tappa weens Ʒillwaͤka Baͤhrns eekſchan tahß
Jum-
Jumprawas Marias Meeſẜahm / unnd lickahß ẜoͤw tieſtiteeß ka
kahds Ʒillwaͤka Baͤhrns . Ohtrà Reiſà ghaja Wings no ẜchahß
Dſiewoẜchanas Nahweh / und lickahß aprackteeß ; Treſẜchà
Reiſà ghahja Wings attkal no tahs Nahwes Dſiewibà / no ẜcho
Ghahjumu ẜackam mehß : Aukſcham ʒehleeß no teems Mir-
roņeems / Ja / no Semmes gir Wings ghahjis Debbeſẜies . No
to pirrmu Ghajumu dſirrdam mehß par Seemas⸗Ꞩwaͤhtkeem /
no to ohtru / ap leelu Peegdeenu / no to Treſẜchu / ap Leeldeenu .
Bett kad taß Laix nahʒe / ka Winjam by eet no ſchahß Dſiewo-
ẜchanas Nahweh / und attkal no Nahwes Dſiewibà / unnd no
ſchahs Paſẜaules redſighe Debbeſẜies / nhe ghribbejahß Wings
ẜlaͤppaͤne attrauteeß ẜaweem Mahʒekļeem{Mahʒekļem} / bett Wings to teem
pirrmahk peeẜacka ar ẜcheem Wahrdeem : Nu no⸗eemu eß py
to / kaß mann ẜuhtijis gir / unnd nhe weens juhſẜo ſtarrpà
jauta mann / kur ey tu ? Bett tadehļ / ka eß to us jums
ẜatʒijis aͤßmu / gir juhſẜa Ꞩirrds pilla Noſkumſchanas
tappuſẜi . Bett Eß ẜacku to teeẜcham : Jums gir
taß labb / ka Eß no eemu . Aiſto / ja eß nhe no⸗eemu / tad
taß Eepreeʒeetais nhe nahk py jums . Bett ja eß eemu /
tad ghribbu eß jums to ẜuhtiet . Taß Kungs JESVS
ghribb tick dauds ẜatʒiet : Jhs ẜchim / und teekam eß py jums re-
dſighe aͤßmu bijis / aͤßmu eß jums par pillu mahʒijis / ka jums ti-
tʒeht / und juhſẜu Titʒibu ar labbeem Darrbeem unnd ghohdighu
Dſiewoẜchannu pa⸗rahdiet buhß / ka juhß Deewam pa⸗tickt /
und ʒaur to Titʒibu eekſchan mann to muhſchighu Dſiewoẜchan-
nu ee⸗manntoht und dabbuit warraht . Bett Nu / nu mann
taß wiß leelakais Darrbs juhſẜas unnd wiſẜas Paſẜaules Peſti-
ẜchannas ja⸗no⸗ſtrahda : Eß ghribbu juhſẜo dehļ / O Ʒillwaͤ-
ko⸗Baͤhrni / leelas Mohkas / Kaunu / und Ꞩahpes ʒeeſt / mirrt /
ẜoͤw lickteeß nokauteeß unnd aprackteeß / no Mirroņeem auk-
ſcham ʒellteeß / Debbeſẜies usbraukt / unnd ghribbu ẜeh-
ſtees
ſtees py to labbu Rohku manna Daͤbbaͤſẜa Taͤhwa : To wiſẜa
JEſus ẜacka ar to Wahrdinju / Eß eemu py Taͤhwu .
Tohß Wahrdus dſirrdeja tee Mahʒekļi / bett no leelas
Noſkummẜchanas tee nhe apdohmajahß no to Kungu JESV
waiʒaht / kapehtʒ Wings eijohtʒ / kaß winjeem labb attlehx no
tahß Eeẜchanas / kad tee to darritu / tad tee labbahke taptu no
Chriſti Mohkahm und Nahwes mahʒiti / ar Wahrdu / ka ʒaur
ta Kungha Chriſti Nahwes wiſẜi Ʒillwaͤki / kattri titʒ ẜoͤw par
labbu to notickuẜchu / py Taͤwu / taß gir / muhſchighà Dſiewibà
und Debbeſẜes Wallſtibà nahkt buhß . Nhe weens / ẜacka taß
Kungs JEſus / juhſẜo ſtarrpà jauta mann / kurr ei tu ? Bett
ka eß us to jums ẜatʒijis aͤßmu / gir juhſẜo Ꞩirrds pilla No-
ſkumẜchanas tappuſẜi . Jebſche nu tee Mahʒekļi nhe waiʒa /
ka teem darriet by / tomaͤhr taß ſchehliegs Kungs Chriſtus JE-
ſus teem to Labbumu ſtahſta / kattra teem attlehx / no tahdas
Eeẜchanas . Taß gir jums labbe / ka eß no⸗eemu . Eß ẜak-
ku jums / Eß / katters Eß ſinnu / kaß juhſẜo Dwehſẜeļo dehļ no
taß ẜwaͤhtas Triaidibas no⸗runnahts gir / und tha jums ihſtaͤne
wiſẜas Leetas ſtahſtiet warru / Eß ẜacku jums / labbe gir taß /
nhe tick ļohte mann / ka jums ; Aiſto / ka JEſus Chriſtus nhe
ẜoͤwis dehļ / bett muhſẜo Peſtiẜchanas labbahd py mums us
Semmes nahʒis ; ihten tha arridſan gir winja pehdeis Ghah-
jums / winja Mohkas unnd Nahwe tapehtʒ notitʒis / ka mehß
ʒaur to labbi buhtam . Ꞩcheitan Wings ẜacka ar ſkaidreem
Wahrdeem : Ja eß nhe no⸗eemu / taß Eepreeʒetais nhe
nahk py jums : Bett ja eß eemu / ghribbu eß jums to ẜuh-
tiet . Taß Labbums teem Mahʒekļeem attlehx no Chriſti
Ghajumu / ka Wings teem to Ꞩwaͤhtu Gharru nopellniet /
und ẜuhtiet ghribb / taß tohß mahʒies pillnighe Chriſtum unnd
winja Labbedarriſchanu und Nopaͤllnu attſiet . Tee Mahʒekļi
by nu{nun} ʒaͤttortà Ghaddà py to Kunghu JEſum Skohlà ghah-
juẜchi
juẜchi / bett teem nhe buhß muhſcham Mahʒekļeem pallickt / bett
irr ʒittus mahʒiet Paſẜauleh / ar Pallieghu tha Ꞩwaͤhta Ghar-
ra . To nhe ghribbeja tee Mahʒekļi praſt / tapehtʒ ẜacka teem to
taß Kungs Chriſtus .
Ja / kad Chriſtus nhe buhtu mirris / unnd no teem Mirro-
ņeem attkal aukſcham ʒehleeß / tad buhtu tee Mahʒekļi und mehs
wiſẜi appackſch teem Ghraͤkeem pallickuẜchi / und nhe buhtam
mehs to Ꞩwaͤhtu Gharru dabbujuẜchi / aiſto taß nhe ghribb
eekſchan ļaunas Dwehſẜeles / neds eekſchan Meeſẜas kat-
tra teem Ghraͤkeem pa⸗daͤwuſẜees gir / dſiewoht / unnd
ghribb taß Kungs JEſus tick dauds ẜatʒiet : Jums buhß nu ar-
ridſan ʒittus Ļaudis mahʒiet / unnd mannu Wahrdu preekſch /
wiſẜu Paſẜaul neſt und ſtahſtiet . Bett tick illghe ka juhß und
wiſẜi Ʒillwaͤki nhe eſẜeeta ar Deewu ẜaliedſenati / nhe warrehß
taß buht : Tadehļ gir jums taß ļohte labb / ka eß py ẜawu Taͤh-
wu no⸗eemu / und ʒaur mannu ʒeeẜchanu unnd Nahwu mannà
Ghohda eekahpu / ka juhß to Ꞩwaͤhtu Gharru dabbujaht / und
eß to paſẜchu jums ẜuhtiet warru .
Mahʒaiteeß ẜcheitan / Mieļi Draughi / py teem Mahʒe-
kļeem tha Kungha JEſu atſiet juhſẜu leelu Wahjibu . Ꞩchee
dſirrdaͤdami / ka CHRJSTVS ghribbohtʒ no teem nohſt / und
py Taͤhwu eet / tohp tee ļohte noſkummuẜchi . Jhten tha mums
( Deewam ſchaͤhl ) arridſan noteekahß / tick illghe ka mums
labbe klahjahß / und taß ſchehliegs Deews ẜawu Ꞩauliet leek
ſpiedeht / tad gir mums leela / liexma unnd drohẜcha Ꞩirrds /
mehs ſchkeetameeß Deewa Klehpi ẜaͤhdohẜchi ; Bett kad Waͤh-
tri und Aukas tahß Nhelaimibas ʒeļļahß / und taß Kungs Chri-
ſtus leekas nohſt no mums eijohtʒ / tad tohp muhſẜa Ꞩirrds pilla
Noſkummẜchanas / und ſchkeetam / JEſus Chriſtus aͤſẜohtʒ itt
nohſt no mums behdſis . To raͤdſam mehs py to Koninju Dawid /
taß
taß leelijahß kahds drohẜch Wiers Wings bijis / tick illghe ka
tam labbe klahjehß / unnd wiſẜur tam laimehjahß / Wings drie-
ſteja ẜatʒiet / Eß muhſcham ſemmeh nhe ghulleẜchu / muh-
ſcham eß ļaun nhe redſehẜchu : bett kad Deews ẜawu Waighu
paẜlehpe / und licka tam weenu unnd ohtru Nhelaim redſeht /
tad ißbijajohß eß / ẜacka Wings . Vnd patteeß gir ta leela
Jßbaile / kad taß Kungs Chriſtus leekahß no mums attkahpjohtʒ
muhſẜà Nhelaimeh . Aiſto kam taß Kungs JESVS gir /
tam gir wiſẜas Leetas / bett kad Wings ſuhd / tad ſuhd wiſẜas
Leetas / wiß Preex / wiſẜa Schaͤlaſtiba / ja irr ta Debbeß und muh-
ſchigha Dſiewoẜchana .
Mehs laſẜam Deewa Ghrahmatà no ta jauna Tobias
Mahtes / ka winja ſchaͤhlojuſẜeeß / kad taß Daͤhls par Laiku pa-
licka nohſt : Ack manns Daͤhls / ẜacka winja Rohkas kullda-
ma / kapehtʒ lickam mehß toͤw ẜweſẜchumà eet / muhſẜo wee-
niegs Preex / unnd Eepreeʒenaẜchana muhſẜà Waͤtʒumà /
muhſẜo Ꞩirrds und muhſẜo Waißla . Ko ſchkeetaht juhß /
manni Draughi / ʒeek leelaka buhtu muhſẜas Ꞩirrds Noſkumm-
ẜchana / kad JEſus Chriſtus ghribbaͤtu no mums nohſt eet / kat-
ters gir muhſẜas Dwehſẜeles Preex / Eepreeʒenaẜchana / muhſẜo
Ꞩirrds und muhſẜo Mannta . Wings ẜacka : Swaͤhtas
gir tahß Atʒis / kattras raͤds ko tee Apuſtuļi redſejuẜchi /
und ẜwaͤhtas gir tahß Auſẜis / ko tee Mahʒekļi gir dſirrde-
juẜchi ; Tad jo nhe buhß tahß Atʒis und Auſẜis ẜwaͤhtas / kattras
JESVM Baͤhdahß buhdamas ney raͤds ney dſirrd / Ja / tahß
Ꞩirrdes nhe buhß ẜwaͤhtas / kattras no to Kunghu JEſu nhe
kļuhſt ee⸗preeʒenatas . Py ẜcho Kunghu gir Preex lieds
pillam / und jauka Buhẜchana py winja labbas Rohkas
muhſchighe / ẜacka taß Konings Dawids ; kaß tad nu nhe
ghribbaͤtu labpraht ẜcho Kunghu allaſch py ẜoͤw palleekamu ?
Winja Luhpas pill no Peenu unnd Maͤddu / Winjam gir
mielaͤ-
mielaͤni Wahrdi / kattri noſkummuẜchu Ꞩirrdi itt labbe warr
ee⸗preeʒenaht / Winjam gir Wahrdi tahß Dſiewibas ; und
kaß to Kunghu attrohd / taß attrohd to muhſchighu Dſiewo-
ẜchanu . Tapehtʒ gir tee ẜwaͤhti Ʒillwaͤki / kattreem ẜawahs
Baͤhdahß JEſus Chriſtus klahte gir . Bett kam taß nhe gir /
tam buhß kaukt und ẜaukt ar to Koninju Dawid : Mannas
Aſẜaras gir manna Barriba Deenas und Nacktis / kad
us mann ickdeenas ẜacka / kurr gir nu taws Deews ? kurr
gir nu Chriſtus ? The ghribb Ʒillwaͤkam tad Ꞩirrds truhkt .
Aiſto Deews patʒ ẜacka : Way teem / kad eß no teem attſtah-
jis aͤßmu .
Bett / manni mieļi Draughi / dohdeeteeß ar Meeru / unnd
ſinnaht / ka taß Kungs JEſus brieſcham leekahß / ihten ka ghrib-
baͤtu Wings no mums nohſt eet / und arridſan nohſt palickt / bett
winjam gir tick ſchehligha Ꞩirrds / ka Wings nhe warr mums
weenus attſtaht . Klauſẜaita und jemmeeta waͤhrà winja mie-
lighus Wahrdus ! Tha ẜacka Wings : Eß aͤßmu toͤw wee-
nu maſu Atʒes mirckli attſtahjis / bett ar leelu Schaͤlaſtibu
ghribbu eß toͤw kraht . Eß aͤßmu mannu Waighu Atʒes⸗
Mirrckly mannohß Dußmohß magkeniet no toͤw pa-
ẜlehpis / bett ar muhſchighu Schaͤlaſtibu ghribbu eß ẜoͤw
par toͤw apſchaͤhloteeß .
Paturreeta to labbe / kadehļ Deews leekahß nohſt eijohtʒ .
Ꞩcheitan ẜacka taß Kungs JESVS / taß gir jums labb /
ka eß no⸗eemu / taß gir jums labb ka eß jums kahdu Nhelaimu
pee⸗ẜuhtu / Juhß pehtʒ ẜatʒieſẜeeta pateikdammi ar to Koninju
Dawid / Kungs taß gir mann labb / ka tu mann pahrmah-
ʒijis eſẜi / ka eß tawu Teeſẜu mahʒitohß . Deews pee⸗ẜuhta
mums daſchadu Nhelaimu / ka Wings mums eekſchan Titʒibas
ſtipprus darriet / eekſchan Mielaͤſtibas eeraddenaht / und eekſchan
tahß Paʒeeẜchanas tha dibbenaht warraͤtu / ka mehs nhe ẜchurp
nhe
nhe turrp ẜchaubameeß . Aiſto / Nhelaime attnaͤſẜahß Pa-
ʒeeẜchanu / Paʒeeẜchana attnaͤſẜahß Jßmanniẜchanu / Jß-
manniẜchana attnaͤſẜahß ʒerribu / bett ʒerriba nhe leek
Kaunà tapt / mahʒa taß Apuſtuls Pahwils . Vnd attkal ẜacka
taß patʒ Mahʒetais : Mehs ſinnam / ka teem / kattri Deewu
bieſtahs / wiſẜas Leetas buhß par labbu notickt .
Tadehļ nu / Manns Draugs / kad Deews toͤw tawu Ꞩirr-
di ar kahdu Nhelaimu / laid buht kahda buhdama / noſkumdeh /
nhe bieſteeß tapehtʒ / aiſto toͤw nhe buhß kaunà palickt . Ap-
luhko wiſẜus waͤtʒaͤkus / kaß gir muhſcham Kaunà tappis /
kaß us Deewu ʒerrejis gir ? kaß gir muhſcham attſtahtʒ /
kaß Deewa⸗Bijaẜchanà gir palitʒis ? jeb kaß gir muhſcham
ap⸗ẜmeetʒ no Winju / kaß Winju peeẜauʒis gir . Aiſto taß
Kungs gir lehniegs und ſchehliegs / unnd peedohd Ghraͤ-
kus / und pallieds kad mehs Baͤdahß aͤſẜam / ẜacka Syrachs .
Paļaujeeß tu tam wiſẜewallditajam Deewam / und nhe pa⸗doh-
deeß Baͤhdahm / kattras tawu noſkummuẜchu Ꞩirrdi wehl
wairahk kraͤmmt / unnd nhemeerighu darra / luhds Deewu{Deeewu} / ka
Wings toͤw ghribbaͤtu klaht ſtahweht ar ẜawu Ꞩwaͤhtu Ghar-
ru / und ar to tawu noſkummuẜchu Ꞩirrdi ee⸗preeʒenaht / unnd
ẜacki :
O Kungs / ʒaur tawu Spaͤhku mums ẜataiſẜi /
Vnd eeſtipprini tahs Meeſẜas Wahjumu /
Ka mehs ẜcheit ſtippre ʒienijam /
Ʒaur Nahwu und Dſiewibu py toͤw ſpeeſchamees .
Ey labpraht und allaſch Baſniʒà / klauſẜi Deewa Wahrdu
no Ꞩirrds / taß toͤw eepreeʒenahß / daſchu mielighu Wahrdinju
tu teitan dſirrdehſẜi / ar ko tu tawu ghruhtu Ꞩirrdi warrehſẜi
remmdeht . Aprunnajeeß / nhe ar Burrweem nhe ar beßdeewi-
gheem Ʒillwaͤkeem / bett ar tawu Mahʒetaju / unnd ar ʒitteem
Deewa⸗Bijatajeem Ļautinjeem / tee toͤw tawu noſkummuẜchu
Ꞩirrdi
Ꞩirrdi weeghlu darries no Deewu und winja Wahrdu runna-
dami . Tee ſinna / ka teem Deewa⸗bijatajeem / unnd kattri no
Deewu ẜchauſti tohp / ta Ꞩirrds ſtahw . Ko tee toͤw pareiſe
mahʒa / to usjemm ar titʒighu Ꞩirrdi / tad buhß tawa Nhelaime
weeghlaka .
Mahʒaiteeß / ohtran kahrtan / Mieļi Draughi / par ko jums
juhſẜas Nahwes turreht buhß / ar Wahrdu / par weenu Noeẜcha-
nu py Taͤhwu . Aiſto kad mehs titʒaͤdami eekſchan JEſum Chri-
ſtum muhſẜu Peſtitaju mirrſtam / tad nahkam mehs ʒaur to Nah-
wu py Deewu to Taͤhwu / kaß mums raddijis / py JEſum Chri-
ſtum / kas mums peſtijis / und py to Ꞩwaͤhtu Gharru / kaß mums
ẜwaͤhtus darrijis gir . To Taißno Dwehſẜeles gir Deewa
Rohkà / nhekahdas Mohkas tahß turr aiſkarr / tahß gir A-
brahama Klehpy / und kaß to pareiſe apdohma / taß nomanna irr
taggad / ka taß labbe gir / kad taß py to Daͤbbaͤſẜo Taͤhwu no⸗eet .
Aiſto kad mehß titʒaͤdammi eekſchan CHRJSTVM JEſum
muhſẜu Peſtitaju mirrſtam / und tam muhſẜu Dwehſẜel pawehle-
jam / tad mums nei tee Ghraͤki / nei Waͤlla / nei Paſẜaules / nei
muhſẜo paſẜcho Meeſẜas Blehdiba kaiteht warr / mehß ſkubbena-
jameeß tad py Taͤhwu eet / kur Preex muſchighe muhſcham .
Ꞩwaͤhti gir tee Mirroņi / kattri eekſchan to Kunghu / taß
gir / titʒaͤdami ka JEſus Chriſtus winjo Peſtitais gir / katters ẜa-
wu dahrghu Aſẜini par teem py Kruſta Kohku ißlehjis gir / mirrſt /
tudeļļ gir tee ẜwaͤhti . Jebſche mehs wiſẜas Leetas Paſẜauleh
attſtahjam / unnd wiſẜa Paſẜaule no mums mirrſtoht baͤhg / nhe
kait necka : Mehs tomaͤhr ar titʒighu Ꞩirrdi ẜackam : Nu eemu
eß py to / kaß manns Deews und Taͤhws gir ; Eß luhdſohs / O
Kungs JEſu Chriſte / ko tu ẜatʒijis eſẜi : Eß peedaͤru toͤw / und
tu peedaͤri mann / kurr eß palleeku / turr buhß toͤw buht /
mums nhe ſchkirrß taß Enaidneex ; tohß Wahrdus pepilldi
nu py mann / ẜchinnies mannahß paſtarahß Baͤhdahß leetʒ mann
redſeht /
redſeht / ka tu teeẜcham eſẜi tawu Taͤhwu luhdſis / unnd Wings
toͤw arridſan gir paklauſẜijis / kad tu ẜatʒiji : Taͤhws eß ghrib-
bu / ka kurr eß aͤßmu / irr tohß py mann laid buht / kattrus
tu mann dehwis eſẜi / ka tee arridſan mannu Ghohdu re-
dſeht warr .
Kad tu / Kungs Chriſte / no Mirroņeem ʒehleeß eſẜi /
Tad eß Kappà nhe palickſchu /
Manna leelaka Eepreeʒenaẜchana tawa Daͤbbaͤſẜo-
Kahpẜchana gir /
Nahwes Jßbail warri tu pa⸗jemmt /
Aiſto kurr tu eſẜi / turr eß nahku /
Py toͤw eß muhſchighe dſiewu und aͤßmu /
Tapehtʒ eß eemu preeʒadameeß py Taͤhwu .
Ghann nu ẜchim brieſcham . Juhß eſẜeeta dſirrdejuẜchi
und mahʒijuẜcheeß / kapehtʒ muhſẜo Kungs JEſus Chriſtus ʒee-
tis und mirris / und tha py ẜawu Daͤbbaͤſẜu Taͤhwu ghajis gir /
ar Wahrdu mums par labb / ka taß mums to ẜwaͤhtu Gharru
ẜuhtitu . Juhß eſẜeeta dſirrdejuẜchi / ka mums drohẜchu Ꞩirrdi /
dſiewodami / Baͤhdas und Nhelaim ʒeeßdami turreht / unnd us
JESVM Chriſtum muhſẜu Peſtitaju paļauteeß buhß / irr
mirrdami buhß mums ſinnaht / unnd titʒeht ka mehs ʒaur Chri-
ſtum py muhſẜu mieļu Daͤbbaͤſẜo Taͤhwu nahkam / und muhſchi-
ghe ar wiſẜeem ẜwaͤhteem Engeļeem py to pallixim / to ẜlaweſ-
ẜim und ghohdahſẜim : To palieds mums wiſẜeem Deews
Taͤhws / Daͤhls und Ꞩwaͤhtais Gharrs ẜlahwaͤhtʒ und ghoh-
dahtʒ no mums und wiſẜas Chriſtitas Draudſes / ẜcheit
laiʒighe unnd muhſchighe muhſcham / Amen /
AMEN .

Evangelium am Sontage
Vocem Iucunditatis, Joh. 16.
To ẜwaͤhtu Ewangelium / ka JEſus Chriſtus mums ee-
droẜchena Deewu peeluhkt / apraxta taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewan-
geliſts Jahnis ẜawà Ghramatà ẜaͤſtà⸗padeßmittà Weetà /
und ſkann tee Wahrdi juhſẜà Wallodà tha :
JEſus ẜatʒija us ẜaweems

eß ẜacku jums / ja juhß tam Taͤh-
wam ko luhxeeta eekſchan mannu
Wahrdu / tad taß jums to dohß .
Jhßſchimm nhe eſẜeeta juhß nhe-
neeka luhguſchi eekſchan mannu Wahrdu . Luhdſee-
ta /
ta / tad juhß jemſẜeeta / ka juhſẜa liexmiba pillniga
warr buht . Scho aͤßmu es jums ʒaur ẜackameem
Wahrdeem runnajis / bett taß Laix nahk / ka eß wairs
ʒaur ẜackameem Wardeem ar jums nhe runnaſchu /
bet jums ſkaidre paſluddenaſchu no ẜawu Taͤhwu .
Tanny paſẜchà Deenà juhß luhkſẜeeta eekſchan man-
nu Wahrdu / und eß nhe ẜacku jums / ka eß to Taͤhwu
juhſẜo dehļ luhkt ghribbu / Aiſto taß Taͤws patʒ juhß
mielo / tapehtʒ / ka juhß mann mielojeeta / und titʒaht /
ka eß no Deewu ißghajis aͤßmu . Eß aͤßmu no Taͤh-
wu ißghajis / und nahʒis eekſchan ſchahß Paſẜaules /
attkal attſtahju eß to Paſẜaul / und eemu py Taͤhwu .
Winja Mahʒekli ẜacka us to : Reds / nu runna tu
ſkaidre / und nhe ẜacki nhe kahdu ẜackamu Wahrdu .
Nu ſinnam mehß / ka tu wiſẜas leetas ſinni / und nhe
gir waijagg / ka toͤw kaßlabban jautha / tapehtʒ titʒam
mehß / ka tu no Deewu ißghajis eſẜi .
MJeļi Draughi / Ꞩchiß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewange-
liums peedaͤrr eekſchan to treſẜchu Ghabbalu
muhſẜas Baͤhrno⸗Mahʒibas / kur taß Kungs JE-
ſus Chriſtus mums mahʒa muhſẜu Daͤbbaͤſẜo
Taͤhwu teeẜcham peeẜaukt / par Gharrighams und Laiʒi-
ghahms leetahms / unnd ka Wings mums ghribbaͤtu ar
ẜawu ẜwaͤtu Gharru walldiet / ghlabboht / muhſẜus Ghraͤ-
kus peedoht / par Kahrdenaſchanu paſẜarghat / unnd no
wiſẜu Laun peſtiet . Ꞩcheitan eekſchan ẜcho Ewangelio taß

muhſẜu
muhhſẜu Luhkſchanu preekſch Deewu eet / und ka mums nhe buhß
bieteeß / bett preeʒighe unnd us Winju paļaudameeß pee-
