To ẜwaͤhtu Ewangelium / ka taß Kunngs JESVS
Weeſẜibahs py weenu Wariſeeri buhdams / weenu
Vhdena Ꞩehrdſighu Ʒillwaͤka waͤſẜaͤlu darrijiß /
und tohß Weeſẜis mahʒijis gir / apraxta taß ẜwaͤhtʒ
Ewangeliſts Lucas / ẜawà Ghramatà ʒaͤttortà padeßmit-
tà Weetà / und ſkann tee Wahrdi juhſẜà Wallodà tha :
VNd taß notickahß / ka JESVS nahʒe weena
Wirſẜeneekà Nammà / ẜwaͤhtà Deenà to Mais
ehſt . Vnd tee ghluneja us Winju / etc .
Mieļi
MJeļi Draughi / nhe dauds lab-
bas Deenas taß Kungs JESVS
Chriſtus uhs ẜchahß Paſẜaules redſige unnd
meeſẜighe ſtaighadams / redſejis gir . Aiſto jeb-
ſche Wings ick⸗kattram / Bagghatam unnd
Nabbagham / kaß to peeluhdſe / labpraht pa-
liedſeja / und teems dauds labb darrija ; tomehr Wings nhe war-
reja ißtickt teems Wariſeeŗeems / tee Winju ļohte eeniedeja . Ka-
pehtʒ ? Tapehtʒ / manns Draugs / ka JEſus Chriſtus us teems
Wariſeeŗeems barehß / ka tee tick beßdeewighe unnd arr Willtu
ween dſiewoja / und nhe pareiſe Deewa Wahrdu maʒija . Tadehļ
arridſan Deewa Daͤhls ʒaur ta Koninja Dawida Mutt ſchaͤhlo-
jahß / ẜatʒidams : Jckdeenas teems Raiſa gir ar manneems
Wahrdeems / wiſẜa winjo Dohmaẜchana gir / ka tee man
ļaun darra / tee turrahß kohpa / und ghluna / ſkattahß us
manneem papehſcheem / ka tee mannu Dwehſẜel ẜa-
ghrahbt warr .
Tomehr pehtʒ tadu Dußmu taß Kunngs Jeſus nheneeka
baͤhdadams / darra to / kaß winjam ja⸗darra / und kadehļ wings no
ẜawu Debbeſẜo Taͤhwu ẜuhtietʒ by / ka Wings arridſan ẜacka :
Eß ghribbu runnaht ( und mahʒiet ) to Taißnibu eekſchan
tahß leelas Draudſes : Redſi / Eß nhe ghribbu ẜawu
Mutt licktee aisbahſt / Kungs to ſinni tu . Ꞩcho raͤdſam
mehß arridſan eekſchan ẜcho ẜwaͤhtu Ewangelio / kad mehß dſirr-
dam laſẜoht / ka tee Waiſeeŗi us tha Kunngha JEſu CHRJſti
Darbu ſkattijuſcheeß / und us winja Wahrdu klauſẜijuẜcheeß gir /
ghribbaͤdami to ẜaghrahbt / und ghuſtiet . Tapehtʒ tee arridſan
Winju Weeſẜibahß luhds / paſtaͤllaͤdami ẜchimm brieſcham / ka
weenam Vhdaͤnu⸗ẜehrdſigham Ʒillwaͤkam tanny paſſcha Nam-
màby nahkt / ka tee warraͤtu redſeht / arrieg taß Kungs Chriſtus
Ꞩwaͤhtà
Ꞩwaͤhtà Deenà bauditohß to Nheweſẜeli dſeedenaht . Bett
taß Kungs / katters wiſẜas leetas raͤds und papreekſche ſinna / taß
teems tadu Kaunu darra / ka tee wiſẜi kluſẜe ʒeeſch . Vnd noman-
nidams / ka tee Weeſẜis dſaͤnnahß auxtaka Weetà ẜehdeht / mah-
ʒa Wings tohß ar weenu krahßnu Liedſibu / ka teems turreteeß /
unnd allaſch abdohmaht buhß : Kaß ẜoͤw patʒ auxtenajahß /
tam buhß ſaͤmmotam tapt .
Mehß ẜchim brieſcham ghribbam apdomaht und pahrluh-
koht / kaß tha Wariſeera Nammà gir notitʒis .
Taß Kungs JEſus Chriſtus dohd mums ẜawu ẜwaͤhtu
Gharru / ka mehß ẜcho Ꞩwaͤhtu Deenu pareiſe ẜwehtiet war-
ram / Amen .
KAd mehß / Mieļi Draughi / ẜchinny Wariſeeŗa Nammà
ee⸗eetam / und tahß Weeſẜibas aplukojam / tad attrohdam
mehß / ka weens Wirßneex no teems Wariſeeŗeems tahß
Weeſẜibas turr / taß no Kunghu JEſum / und ʒittus Weeſẜis gir
ẜawà Nammà Weeſẜibahß luhdſis . Aiſto tha ẜacka ẜchiß ẜwaͤhtʒ
Ewangeliums : Taß notickahß / ka JESVS nahʒe weena
Wirrßneeka Nammà / ẜwaͤhta Deenà to Mais ehſt . Vnd
tee ghluneja us Winju . Taß Kunngs JEſus nhe nahk nhe
luhktʒ / ka daſſch ſpeeſchahß Weeſẜibahß / und gir tick dauds luhktʒ /
ka Ꞩunns : bett Chriſtus JEſus nahk luhktʒ . Taß Wariſeeŗo
Wirrßneex nhe luhdſe to ar labbu Ꞩirrdi / to arridſan taß Kungs
JEſus ghann ſinnaja / aiſto Wings wehl attminnejahß / ka ʒiti
Wariſeeŗi nhe ẜenn us winju Skohlà buhdami / ẜatʒija / ey ara /
und ey nohſt no ẜchennenes . Ka Draugs Wings nhe by
Weeſẜibahß luhktʒ / bett ka tee Blehẜchi winjam warraͤtu Nhelai-
meh eeweſt . To ẜacka irr taß Ewangeliſts Lucas ẜcheitan : Tee
ghluneja us Winju . Tee ghribbeja ißklauſẜiteeß / arrieg tee
warraͤtu ko redſeht und dſirrdeht / ko tee warraͤtu tam Semmes⸗
Ꞩogham
Ꞩogham Pontio Pilato / jeb tam Koninjam Herodes / jeb teems
Auxteems Baſniʒa⸗Kungheems attẜatʒiet / to Kunnghu JEſum
apmaͤloht / und kada Nhelaimeh eeweſt . Redſi / tha ghluneja taß
Ꞩaimneex ar ẜaweems Weeſẜeems us to Kunnghu JEſum .
Ꞩcheitan / Manns Draugs / tohp toͤw rahdietʒ / ka allaſch /
unnd irr taggad tahdi Ļaudis tohp attraſti / kattri labbus Wahr-
dus ſinna doht / bett ta Ꞩirrds teems pilla Blehdibas und Will-
tibas gir . Ꞩchiß Wariſeers Chriſtum luhds Weeſẜibahß py
ẜawu Ghalldu / bett Wings ghribb ẜcho peekrahpt . Tadi Ʒill-
waͤki gir preekſch Deewu und ghodigheems Ļaudeems weena nhe-
ghanta Leeta . Tee gir tee / no kattreems taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Konings
Dawids ẜacka : Tee runna mielighe arr ẜawu Tuwaku /
und teems gir nickna Ꞩirrds . Winjo Mutte gir ghlud-
denaka nhe ka Ꞩweeſts / unnd teems gir tattſche Karrſch
Prahtà / winjo Wahrdi gir miextaki nhe ka Oelljeß / und
gir tomaͤhr plicki Sohbini . Winji dohd labbus Wahr-
dus / bett Ꞩirrdy lahd tee . Teems Deews leelu Ꞩohdibu
dohß / ka teems nhe buhß puß⸗muhſchu dſiewoht . Tahds
ghodiegs Puttniß by taß Joabs / taß ẜweiʒenaja und ſkuhpſtija
to Amaſam / und tomehr tick mielighe turraͤdammeeß / taß to oh-
tru ſlaͤppaͤne noduhre . Tahds by Judas / tha Kunngha JEſu
CHriſti Apuſtuļo weens / no kattru Wings ſchaͤlojahß : Tu eſẜi
manns Beedris / Ꞩarrgs unnd Radda Wiers / kattri mehß ka
Draughi kohpa dſiewojam / unnd ſtaighajam kohpà Deewa⸗
Namma .
To jemm waͤhra / Manns Draugs / und ẜarrghajeeß par
tadu Willtibu / und blehdighu Ꞩirrdi . Deews tohß raͤds / unnd
attkal attradieß / tee willtighi Ļaudis notaͤck ka Vhdens /
ẜacka taß Konings Dawids . Tai miextai Mehlei / und will-
tighai Ꞩirrdei nhe buhß us Deewa Kallnu / taß gir Deb-
beſẜo Wallſtibà nahkt .
Vnd
Vnd tu{to} ohtris mahʒais / ka tu ghuddrighe ẜchinny Paſẜau-
leh dſiewo . Tu dſirrdi / ka Deewam ſchaͤhl / leels Willts ſtarrpan
teems Ʒillwaͤka⸗Baͤhrneems gir : tapehtʒ / dſiewo ar ick⸗kattru
mielighe / bett ſtarrp tuhxtoẜcheems mohke weenam titʒi .
Nhe us⸗titʒi nhe weenam Draugham / ja tu nhe eſẜi to
Baͤhdahß adſinnis / mahʒa Syrachs .
Laideeta mums nu wehl ẜchinnies Weſẜiebahs apſkattiteeß ;
teitan attrodam mehß to Kunnghu JEſum ẜaͤdohẜchu . Bett
pirrms tee Weeſẜis wiſẜi apẜaͤhdahß / eeraugha JEſus Chriſtus
weenu Nheweſẜaͤlu Ʒillwaͤku / katters no to Vdaͤna⸗Ꞩaͤhrghu itt
ustullʒis und uspampis by . Kaß ſinna / negg tee Wariſeeŗi paſ-
ſchi ẜcho Nheweſẜeli tanny Nammà paſtellejuſchi / ghribbaͤdami
ẜajuſt / arrieg taß Kungs Chriſtus to Ꞩwehta⸗Deenà dſedenatu ?
Bett ko darra JEſus Chriſtus ? Wings wiſẜas leetas ſinnadams
waiʒa lieds tam Ꞩaimneekam / ka irr ʒittahms Weeſẜeems /
Arrieg taß klatohß / Ꞩwehtà⸗deenà weenu Nheweſẜelu Ʒillwaͤku
dſeedenaht ? Jemmeeta waͤhra / ẜchee Wariſeeŗi tha dohwaja :
jeb taß JEſus no Naʒareth ẜcho Ʒillwaͤku weſẜaͤlu darries / jeb
nhe ; tad tomehr Wings to Baußlu pahrkahps . Peſties wings
to us ẜcho Ꞩwehtu Deenu / tad warram mehß to apẜuhdſeht / ka
Wings to Treſẜchu Baußlu gir pahrkapis / katters tha ſkann :
Toͤw buhß to Ꞩwaͤhtu Deenu ẜwehtiet . Attkal / ja Wings
tam nabbagham Ʒillwaͤkam ẜchodeen nhe paliedſehß no ẜawas
Nheweſẜelibas / tad ghribbam mehß ẜatʒiet / Wings nhe mieļo
ẜawu Tuwaku / ka ẜoͤw paſſchu . Bett taß Kungs JEſus ſinna-
dams ẜcho Blehẜcho Ꞩirrdes / waiʒa / ko tee ſchkeet / arrieg klah-
tohß Ꞩwaͤhtà Deenà weenu Nheweſẜaͤlu Ʒillwaͤku dſeedenaht
und weſẜaͤlu darriet ? Tee Wariſeeŗi nhe ſinnaja / ko teem by ad-
billdeht . Aiſto ja tee ẜatʒietu / taß ghann peedaͤrroteeß / ka irr ẜwaͤ-
tà Deenà warraͤtu paliedſeht weenam Nheweſẜeļam / tad tee paſ-
ẜchi prett ẜoͤw runnatu / und buhtu wellt bijis / ko tee ẜawa Prahtà
by
by jaͤhmuẜcheeß . Ꞩatʒietu tee attkal / Nhe / taß nhe klahjahß
Ꞩwaͤhtà Deenà dſeedenaht / tad teems nhe buhtu kahda Waina
bijuſẜi / to Kunghu JEſum apẜuhdſeht . Tapehtʒ ʒeeſch tee itt
kluſẜe .
Ka te nu nheneeka adbild / tad jaͤmm JEſus Chriſtus ẜcho
Nheweſẜeli / unnd darra to Atʒeems redſoht tudeļļ weenà Atʒes-
mirrkly waͤſẜaͤlu{weſẜaͤlu} / taß Vhdens⸗Tulßnis ẜehſchahß / und ẜaplaxt /
und tohp taß / katters taggad uspampis by / diſchane teews .
Ka nu taß Kunngs JEſus ẜcho Nheweſẜeli weſẜaͤlu darri-
dams nhe by ghraͤkojis / neds kahdu Baußlu pahrkahpis / rahda
Wings arr weenu Liedſibu / ẜatʒidams us to Ꞩaimneeku unnd us
teems Weeſẜeems : Kaß gir juhſẜo ſtarrpà / kamm ẜaws
Wehrſẜis jeb Eſelis Ackà eekriet / unnd taß to dudeļļļ nhe
ißwaͤllk Ꞩwaͤhtà Deenà . Ja juhß tad nhe ghraͤkojeeta wee-
nam beßprahtigham Lohpam paliedſaͤdammi / tad eß itt nheneeka
ghraͤkojis buhſchu ẜchim Ʒillwaͤkam Ꞩwehtà Deenà palliedſaͤ-
dams / aiſto jo Ʒillwaͤhx auxtahx gir / nhe ka kahds Lohps . Vnd
tee nhe warreja winjam us teems Wahrdeems nheneeka
adbilldeht / teem by to Kunnghu JEſum ar Meeru lickt .
Mahʒaiteeß ẜcheitan / Manni Draughi / kahds ghodiegs
und baggahts Weeſẜis taß Kungs JEſus Chriſtus gir / Wings
to Mais / to Barribu / kattra winjam preekſcha ʒaͤllta tohp / gho-
dighe attmaxa . Ꞩwehtietʒ gir taß Namms / kurr Wings mah-
jo / ẜwehtietʒ gir taß Ghallds / unnd ghauſẜenata gir ta Maiſe / py
kattras taß Kungs JEſus arridſan ẜehſch . Ꞩcheitan attmaxa
Wings to Malltiet / to Nheweſẜeli dſeedenadams . Kahſahß
buhdams eekſchan Canà / eeſchkingkoja Wings teems jauneems
Ļaudeems krahßnu Wienu / unnd attmaxa tha lieds pillam ko
Wings ar ẜaweems Mahʒekleems ap⸗ehdis by . Wings nahg-
dams py Ʒacheo / attmaxaja tam ẜawu Meelaͤſtu paliedſaͤdams
tam py Meeſẜas und Dwehſẜeles / aiſto tha Wings ẜacka : Ꞩcho-
deen
deen gir ẜchai Nammai palliedſiba notickuſẜi . Maria / Mar-
tha und Laʒarus daſche reis to Kunnghu JEſum Weeſẜibahß
lughuẜchi / to Labb⸗darriẜchanu Wings pehtʒ tha attmaxaja / kad
Laʒarus no leelu Ꞩaͤhrghu pahrjaͤmbtʒ nomirra / tad Wings to
attkal no Mirroņeems usmohdenaja .
Tapehtʒ / Manns Draugs{Drauds} / darri ko darridams / peeluhko ka
taß Kungs JEſus arridſan py tawu Ghalldu ẜehſch / luhds to ar
taweem Pahtareems / Wings ghodighe toͤw attmaxahß / und tu
redſehſẜi / ka Winja Paͤhdas wiſẜur no Tauku pileht pill .
Nahk kahds nabbags Ʒillwaͤhx / dohd tam kaß toͤw py Rohkas /
JEſus Chriſtus toͤw attmaxahß . Aiſto tha Wings ẜohla :
Kaß weenu no ẜcheems maſakeems dſirrden ar weenu
Bickeri auxta Vhdena / patteeß eß ẜacku jums / taß nhe
palix tam nhe⸗attmaxahtʒ . Ja tad JEſus Chriſtus weenu
auxtu Vhdens Mallku ghribb attmaxaht ; tad Wings jo wehl
wairahk Pattackas⸗Allus⸗Maͤddas⸗Mallku attmaxahß . Ock /
Manns Draugs / labb tam / ẜwehtietʒ gir taß Ʒillwaͤhx / kattru
ẜchiß Kungs ißwehle / unnd py ẜoͤw peelaiſchahß / tam gir
baggata Ꞩwehtiba / ẜacka taß Konings Dawids .
Wehl mahʒaiteeß / Manni Draughi / kahduß Darrbus
jums buhß Ꞩwaͤhtahß Deenahß darriet .
To Ꞩweh⸗deenu buhß mums ẜwehtiet / ta gir ta Kungha
CHRiſti Deena . Aiſto tanny Deenà JEſus Chriſtus muhſẜo
Kungs und Peſtitais gir peedſimmis / apghraiſietʒ / und aukſcham
ʒehleeß no teems Mirroņeems : Tanny Deenà gir JEſus Chri-
ſtus teems Apuſtuļeems to Ꞩwehtu Gharru no Debbeſẜu redſi-
ghe noẜuhtijiß . Tadehļ mehß Chriſtiti Ļaudis arridſan to Ꞩweh-
deenu ẜwehtijam / und Deewam kallpojam / ka tee Juddo⸗Ļaudis
to Ꞩeß⸗deenu ẜwehtija . Tanny paſſchà Ꞩweh⸗deenà /
und wiſẜohß Ꞩwehtkohß buhß mums no wiſẜenadu Darrbu att-
ſtaht / laid ta buhtu kada buhdama . Toͤw nhe buhß arrt / etʒeht /
pļawt
pļawt / kullt / wehrpt / und ẜchuht / und tha projam ; bett Deewam
buhß toͤw kallpoht / Baſniʒà eedams / Deewa Dſeeßmus unnd
Pahtarus mahʒidameeß / unnd dſeedadams / Deewam pateick-
dams par wiſẜu Labbu / ko Wings toͤw to ißghajuẜchu Neddeļļu
paradijiß gir / noluhds Deewam tawus Ghraͤkus / klauſẜi Deewa
Wahrdu / und jauʒeeß tha dſiewoht / ka taws Mahʒetais toͤw a-
ran Deewa Wahrdu und Ghramatu mahʒa . Laid tawi Baͤhr-
ni und Ꞩaime arridſan eejuhxt Deewam par Ghodu dſiewoht .
Dohma / ẜacka Deews patʒ / ka tu to ẜwaͤhtu Deenu ẜwehti .
Ꞩeſẜchas Deenas buhß toͤw ſtradaht / unnd wiſẜu tawu
Darrbu noſtradaht / bett ẜeptita Deena gir ta Ꞩwehta
Deena ta Kungha tawa Deewa / tad nhe buhß toͤw nhe-
kadu Darrbu darriet / neds taws Daͤhls / neds tawa
Meita / neds taws Kallps / neds tawa Kallpone / nedds
taws Lohps / neds taws Ꞩweſẜcheneex / ( Ebuweetis ) kaß
tawahß Wahrtieß ( und appakſchan taweems Paſpahrņeems )
gir . Aiſto ẜeẜchahß Deenahß gir Deews taß Kunngs
Debbeſẜu und Semm darrijiß / und to Juhri / und wiſẜu
kaß turr eekſchan gir / und duſẜeja ẜeptità Deenà / tadehļ
ẜwehtija taß Kungs to Ꞩwehtu Deenu .
Bett tomehr ſinni / Manns Draugs / ka toͤw attwehlaͤhtʒ
gir daſſch Darrbs / Ꞩwehtà⸗Deenà darriet . Kad Ꞩirrineeki
Ꞩweh⸗deenà ẜiŗŗo / tad nhe gir toͤw aisleektʒ tawu Nabbadſibu /
ko Deews toͤw gir dehwis / ẜlehpt und ghlabboht : Kad Vgguns⸗
Ghraͤhx Ꞩweh⸗deenà laͤtʒahß / nhe gir toͤw aisleektʒ / Vhdeni pee-
neſt und dſehſt . Warri tu tawam Kaiminjam und ʒittam Ʒill-
waͤkam kahdà leetà peetetʒeht und paliedſeht / tohß Nheweſẜeļus
aplukoht / teems Vbbagheems Maiſes Ghabbalu noghreeſt /
taß nhe gir toͤw aisleektʒ . Nhe eſẜi tu ween weens Klauſẜi-
tais / bett arridſan weens Darritais pehtʒ Deewa
Mahrdu .
Bett
Bett Deewam ẜchaͤhl / ka tohp ẜchy Mahʒiba no daſchu
Nhebehdneeku pahrkahpta . Wings ẜehſch Deenas diwi / trieß /
py Klappi / ſteep ka Aſẜaras no Atʒeem laͤtʒ / pehtʒ Ꞩaͤhtà pahrnah-
ʒiß / weenà Deenà ghribb Wings to Darrbu panahkt / nhe taupi-
dams irr to Ꞩweh⸗deenu . Daſſch aŗŗ / etʒe / pļau / ʒaͤhrt / daͤdſe-
na / kŗau Liedumu / kad ʒitti Ļautiņi Deewa Wahrdohß eet / wai-
ʒahſẜi tu / kapehtʒ wings Ꞩwehdeenà ſtrahda / und nhe eet arridſan
Baſniʒà ? Tad addbilldehß toͤw tahds Blehds ; Wai tad Ꞩweh-
deenà arridſan nhe buhß ehſt ? Bett klauſẜais tu Deewa⸗Pullgho-
tais / nhe eſẜi tu muhſcham dſirrdejiß / ko taß ẜwehtʒ Apuſtuls Pa-
wils ẜacka : Nhe allojeeteeß / Deews nhe leekahß apẜmee-
teeß . Kad ick⸗kattris dſaͤnnahß us ẜawu Nammu / bett Deewa
Namms tuckſch palleek / tad ghribb attkal Deews Baddu unnd
Kaŗŗu tadà Semme ẜuhtiet / teems buhß ehſt und nhe pee⸗ehſteeß /
teems buhß Ʒaurumainà Maiſẜà eebehrt / ko tee krahſta .
Nhe gir taß teeß / manns Draugs / ka tee wißleelahki Ghraͤ-
ki noteek Ꞩwehdeenà / und ʒittohß Ꞩwehtkohß ? Kad mehß no
kadas Nhelaimes dſirrdam / und waiʒajam / kad ta gir notickuſẜi ?
tad ẜacka / Tanny{Tannny} Ꞩwehdeenà taß kļua nodurrtʒ / tanny Ꞩweh-
deenà tee unnd tee gir ẜabahruſcheeß / tannieß Ꞩwehtkohß ẜchi
unnd ta par Mauku tappuſẜi / tanny Ꞩwehdeenà ẜchiß unnd taß
peedſehreeß apẜlieka / und kaß warr wiſẜadu Nhelaim und Ghraͤ-
ku ẜchinny briedy ißſtahſtiet / kattra Ꞩwehdeenohß noteek ? Vnd
wiſẜa tahda Nhelaime ghaddahß / kad tee Ļaudis to Ꞩwehdeenu
nhe ẜwehti pareiſe .
Nu / manns Draugs / ey ẜwehdeenà Baſniʒà / pateitʒ Dee-
wam no Ꞩirrds dibben par wiſẜu Labbu / ko wings toͤw ißghaju-
ẜchà Neddeļa paradijiß und dehwis gir / noluhds Winjam tawus
Ghraͤkus / arr kattreems tu Winju eſẜi apkaitenajiß / luhds ka
Wings toͤw / tawus Baͤhrnus / Ꞩaim / Lohpus / Aehkas / ja tawu
Meeſẜu und Dwehſẜel par wiſẜenadu Nhelaim ghlabboht unnd
pa⸗
pa⸗ẜarrghaht / tha lieds arridſan ẜcho nahkoẜcha Neddeļà toͤw ar
ẜawu Ꞩwehtu Gharru klaht ſtaweht / tawas Rohkas Darrbu
ẜwehtiet und ſkubbenaht / par wiſẜenadeems Ghraͤkeems toͤw pa-
ẜarrghaht ghribbaͤtu . Redſi / Tahdas Leetas irr Baſniʒà / irr
Ꞩaͤhtà buhdams / kad tu apdomahſẜi / tad toͤw ghann ihß Laix
taps / ja tu wehl tahß Mahʒibas / kattras tu no tawu Mahʒetaju
Baſniʒà dſirrdejis / arridſan attghraͤmmohſẜi / ka kada Aws to att-
ghraͤmmo / ko winja ehduſẜi gir . Taß buhß toͤw no Meeſẜas
und Dwehſẜeles labb .
Kungheem / Muiſchas⸗Kungheem / Waggharehm / Jaht-
neekeem / ( Stahraſteem / Cubiaſẜeem / ) buhß arridſan uslukoht /
ka winjo Ļaudis to Ꞩwehdeenu pareiſe ẜwehti . Ja tee to nhe
darra / tad tee ar ẜchweſẜcheems Ghraͤkeems apghraͤkojahß .
Deewa Ꞩohdibu tee nhe ißbehx . Mehß laſẜam Deewa Ghra-
matà / Nehemias redſaͤdams / ka Ļaudis Ꞩwehta⸗Deena ſtrah-
daja und Labbibu eewedde / eekſchan Jeruſalemes / ẜatʒija Wings
us teems Wirrſẜeneekeems ; Kahda ta leeta gir / ko juhß dar-
reeta / und pahrkapeeta to Ꞩwehtu⸗deenu ? Negg muhſẜo
Taͤhwi arridſan tha darrija / unnd muhſẜo Deews wiſẜu
ẜchadu Nhelaim par mums und muhſẜo Pili pahrwed-
de . Vnd juhß to Dußmibu par Jſrael wehl krahjaht .
Wings / taß Nehemias licka Wackarohß tahß Wahrtiß ais-
ẜlehkt / und by teems Pretʒeneekeems par to Ꞩwehtu⸗Deenu ara
pallickt . Redſeeta / Manni Draughi / taß by weens ghodiegs
Kunngs / Wings nhe ghribbeja ļaut / Ꞩwehta Deenà nhekahdu
Darrbu ſtradaht / bett teems Ļaudeems by Deewam kallpoht . To
by muhſẜeems Kunngheems arridſan darriet .
Nhe gir taß Kauns ? nhe gir taß Ghraͤx ? kad ʒitti ghodighi
Ļaudiß Deewa Namma gir / tad ʒitti us Lauku ſtrahda / waͤdd
Ꞩuhduß / ẜehſch Krohgha / pliete / Atʒiß ẜlauʒidami / Ʒittʒ ʒittu
Blehdibu darra / ẜehſch arà us Kappẜehti / unnd runna ka ghodi-
gham
gham Ʒillwaͤkam Auſẜiß ẜuhſt dſirrdoht . Weena Weetà Dee-
wa Wahrdu mahʒa / ohtra Weetà attkal lahd . Tahdu beßdee-
wighu Dſiewoẜchanu nhe attſtahß Deews / katters wiſẜas leetas
reds / nhe⸗ẜohditu . Wings ẜohdieß Kunghus und Ļaudis . Ta-
pehtʒ / O Semme / Semme / Semme / klauſẜi Deewa
Wahrdu .
Ꞩchimm brieẜcham ghann . Taß ſchehliegs Deews ghrib-
baͤtu mums ar ẜawu Schaͤlaſtibu klaht ſtaweht / ka mehß ẜchahß
Mahʒibas paturreht / und pehtʒ tahms muhſẜu Dſiewoẜchanu
eeſtahdiet warram / Amen / Amen .

h.z: To ẜwaͤhtu Ewangelium / Ko tick lieds tee Deßmitti
Deewa Baußly / ka arridſan / ko taß ẜwaͤhtʒ E-
wangeliums und tha Mahʒiba no CHRJSTV
JESV arr ihſẜeems Wahrdeems mums mahʒa /
laſẜam mehß apraxtitu py to ẜwehtu Ewangeliſtu Mat-
theo / diwi deßmita unnd ohtra Weetà / unnd ſkann tee

lpp.z: KAd tee Wariſeeri dſirrde-
ja / ka JEſus teems Saduce-
ereems to Mutt aisbahſis by /
ẜapullʒejahß tee . Vnd weens
ſtarpan teems / weens Raxta-
mahʒetais kahrdenaja to / und
ẜatʒija : Meiſteri / kurrſch gir taß
auxtakais Baußliß eekſchan to Baußlu ? Bett
JESVS ẜatʒija us to : Toͤw buhß Deewu tawu
Kunnghu mieļoht no wiſẜas Ꞩirrdes / no wiſẜas
Dwehſẜeles / no wiſẜu Prahtu . Taß gir taß aux-
takaiß Baußlis . Bett taß ohtris gir tam liedſaͤns .
Toͤw buhß tawu Tuwaku mieļoht ka ẜoͤw paſẜchu .
Ꞩchinnieß diweijohß Baußließ karrajahß wiſẜi
Baußlis und tee Proweetes .
Kad
Kad nu tee Wariſeeri kohpa by / jautaja tohß
JEſus / und ẜatʒija : Ko ſkeetahß juhß no Chriſto ?
Ka Daͤhls gir taß ? Winji ẜatʒija / Dawida . Taß
ẜatʒija us teem : Ka ẜautʒ to tad Dawids Ghar-
rà par Kunnghu ? Ꞩatʒidams : Taß Kunngs ẜa-
tʒija us mannu Kunnghu / ẜehdeeß pa mannu lab-
bu Rohku / teekams eß tawus Eenaidneekus leeku
par Pamaͤßlu tawahm Kahjahm . Ja to nu Da-
wids par Kunnghu ẜautʒ / ka gir taß tad winja
Daͤhls ? Vnd nhe weens nhe ſinnaja tam kahdu
Wahrdu adbilldeht / und nhe drieſteja arridſan no
tahß Deenahß tam wairs jautaht .
MJeļi Draughi / Ꞩchiß ẜwaͤhtʒ preek-
ſchelaſẜietʒ Ewangeliums peedaͤrr pirmajan
kahrtan eekſchan wiſẜeems Deßmitteems
Deewa Baußleems / kattri mums rahda und
mahʒa / ka mums buhß tick labb prett Deewu
ka arridſan prett muhſẜu Tuwaku Ʒillwaͤku
turreteeß / arr Wahrdu tha / ka JEſus Chriſtus ẜcheitan ẜacka :
Toͤw buhß Deewu tawu Kunnghu mieļoht no wiſẜu
Ꞩirrdi / no wiſẜu Dwehſẜel / no wiſẜu Prahtu . Taß gir
taß auxtakaiß Baußliß . Bett taß ohtris gir tam lie-
dſaͤns : Toͤw buhß tawu Tuwaku mieloht / ka ẜoͤw paſ-
ſchu . Ꞩchinnieß diweijohß Baußließ karrajahß wiß
Baußlis und tee Proweetes . Wiß ko mehß eekſchſan Mo-
ſis Ghramatahms / unnd py teems ẜwehteems Proweteems laſ-
ẜam / ka mums Deewu unnd muhſẜu Tuwaku Ʒillwaͤku mieļoht
buhß /
buhß / taß kluhſt wiß eekſchan ẜcheems Wahrdeems mahʒietʒ / ka
arridſan taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils raxta : Arr ihſſeems
Wahrdeems ẜackoht no to Baußlu : ( taß mahʒa mums )
to Mielaͤſtibu no ſchkieſtas Ꞩirrds / und no labbas Ꞩirr-
des Sinnaẜchanas / und no nhewilltighas Titʒibas . Vnd
no ẜcheems Baußleems ẜacka Deews patʒ tha : Eß taß Kungs
taws Deews / aͤßmu weens dußmiegs Deews / katters
par teems / kattri mann eenied / tohß Taͤhwa Ghraͤhkus
majahß peemeckleju py teems Baͤhrneems lieds treſſchu
und ʒaͤtturtu Aughumu . Bett teems / kattri man mieļo /
und mannus Baußlus turr / teems darru eß labb / lieds
tuhxtotu Aughumu . Taß gir tick dauds ẜatʒietʒ : Deews
beedina ẜohdiet wiſẜus kattri ẜchohß Baußlus pahrkahp .
Tapehtʒ buhß mums bieteeß par winja Dußmibu / unnd
prett tadeems Baußleems nhe ghraͤkoht . Bett Wings
ẜohla Schaͤlaſtibu unnd wiſẜenadu Labbumu wiſẜeems
kattri ẜchohß Baußlus turr . Tapehtʒ buhß mums win-
ju arridſan mieļoht / und winjam ustitʒeht / und labpraht
darriet pehtʒ winja Baußleems .
Ohtran kahrtan peedaͤrr arridſan ẜchiß ẜwehtʒ Ewange-
liums eekſchan to ohtru Lohʒekli muhſẜas ẜwaͤhtas{ẜwehtas} Titʒibas / kurr
mehß ẜackam : Eß titʒu eekſchan JEſum Chriſtum / Dee-
wa weenighu Daͤhlu / muhſẜu Kunghu / katters eejemmtʒ
gir no to Ꞩwaͤhtu Gharru / peedſimbtʒ no tahß Jum-
prawas Maria . Aiſto ar teems Wahrdeems mehß muhſẜu Ti-
tʒibu no to Kunghu JEſu Chriſto us⸗ẜackam / ka Wings gir pat-
teeß Deews no to Taͤhwu eekſchan Muſchibas pedſimbtʒ / und ar-
ridſan patteeß Ʒillwaͤhx no tahß Jumprawas Maria peedſim̃is /
taß gir ; JEſus Chriſtus gir patteeß Deews uñ patteeß Ʒillwaͤhx .
Vnd to mums arridſan ẜcheitan mahʒa ẜchiß Ewangeliums / kad
tee Wariſeeŗi ẜacka / Chriſtus aͤſẜohtʒ Dawida Daͤhls / und kad
Chriſtus
Chriſtus patʒ klaht ẜacka / ka Chriſtus aͤſẜohtʒ irr Dawida Kungs .
Aiſto Dawida Daͤhls gir Wings pehtʒ ẜawas Ʒillwaͤʒibas / und
ka wings no Dawida Ʒilltu und raddu ka Ʒillwaͤhx gir peedſim-
mis ; bett Dawida Kungs gir Wings / ka weens Deews / Kungs
par wiſẜeems Kungheems / und taß Konings par wiſẜeems
Koninjeems .
Ꞩchimm brieſcham ghribbam mehß klauſẜiteeß / ka weens
Raxtamaʒetais tam Kungham Chriſto waiʒa / kurrſch taß auxta-
kais Baußliß aͤſẜohtʒ / und ka tam JEſus Chriſtus adbild : Pehtʒ
ka Chriſtus tam Raxtamaʒetajam und teems Wariſeeŗeems att-
kal waiʒa / par ko tee Chriſtum turr .
O Kunngs JEſu Chriſte / ẜaẜilldi muhſẜas ẜaẜallu-
ſchas Ꞩirrdes arr tawu ẜwaͤhtu{ſwaͤhtu} Gharru / ka mehß toͤw
und muhſẜu Tuwaku mieļojam / unnd toͤw ihſtaͤne adſie-
ſtam / Amen .
MJeļi Draughi / taß ẜwehtʒ Ewangeliſts Mattheus ẜacka
tha : Kad tee Wariſeeŗi dſirrdeja / ka JEſus teems
Saduceeŗeems to Mutt aisbahſis by / ẜapullʒejahß
tee . Ꞩcheitan buhß jums ſinnaht / ka tee Saduceeŗi nhe titʒeja / ka
teems Ʒillwaͤkeems buhß Paſtarà Deenà attkall aukſcham ʒell-
teeß no teem Mirroņeems , tee nhe titʒeja / ka Enghels / Debbeß /
Waͤllß und Elle aͤſẜoti / tee nahʒe py to Kunghu JEſum / unnd ẜa-
tʒija : Meiſteri / tu dauds mahʒi no tahß Aukſchamʒellſchanas
tahß Meeſẜas ; Py mums by weena Ꞩeewa / tai gir ẜeptinji Wie-
ri / wiß weenas Mahtes Baͤhrni und Brahļi bijuſchi / und weens
Bralis pehtʒ ohtru to Ꞩeewu laulaja / bett nu gir wiſẜi tee ẜeptin-
ji Brahļi nomirruſchi / und ta Ꞩeewa arridſan nomirra . Ja tad
nu te Ʒillwaͤka⸗Baͤhrni{Ʒillwaͤka⸗Behrni} attkal aukſcham ʒellẜeeß no teems Mirro-
ņeems / ka tu mahʒi / tad ẜacki mums / kaß no teems ẜeptinjeems
Wiereems to par Ꞩeewu paturrehß ?
Tha
Tha jautadami ghribbeja tee Saduceeŗi tam Kunngham
JEſu Chriſto Kaunu darriet / iht kaut buhtu Wings nhe pareiſe
mahʒijiß / und nhe aͤſẜoti weena Aukſchamʒellſchana tahß Meeſ-
ẜas ghaiditina . Bett JEſus adbilldeja / unnd ẜatʒija us teems :
Juhß allojeeta / und nhe ſinnaht to Raxtu / neds Deewa Spaͤhku{Spehku} .
Eekſchan tahß Aukſcham⸗ʒellſchanas tee nei pretʒehß / ney lixeeß
pretʒeteeß / bett tee gir ihten ka tee Deewa Engeļi Debbeſẜieß .
Bett nhe eſẜeta juhß laſẜijuſhi no tahß Auxſchãʒellſchanas to Mir-
roņo / ka jums ẜatʒietʒ gir no Deewu / kad Wings runna : Eß aͤßmu
taß Deews Abrahama / und taß Deewa Jſaaca / und taß Deews
Jaͤcoba ? Bett Deews nhe gir weens Deews no Nomirruẜcho /
bett to Dſiewo . Vnd kad to tee Ļaudis dſirrdeja / brienodam̃eeß
ißtruʒenajahß tee par winja Maʒibu / ʒeete kluß / uñ ghaja nohſt .
Tahdi Ļaudis wehl dauds / Manni Draughi / attraſti tohp /
kattri nhe titʒ weenu Aukſchamʒellſchanu tahß Meeſẜas / und wee-
nu muhſchighu Dſiewoſchanu . Ʒeekahds ſkeet / kad taß Ʒillwehx
mirrſt / tad taß ihten tha ißniext unnd bohja eet / ka kahds beßprah-
tiegs Lohps / taß mirrdams peepohl py Semmes / Semmes kahr-
tà tohp / unnd muhſcham attkall nhe ʒeļļahß . Buhtu daſſch no
Ꞩirrds titʒejiß / ka taß Ʒillwaͤhx Paſtarà Deenà attkal aukſcham
ʒellſẜeeß no ẜawas Kappas / und ka pehtʒ ſchahß behdighas{blehdighas} Dſie-
woſchanaß mums gir ghattawa darrita weena Dſiewoſchana
muhſcham beß Ghallu : patteeß taß nhe buhtu tick droſche ghraͤh-
kojiß { ghrehkojiß } .
Bett dſirrdieg tu Ʒillwaͤhx{Ʒillwehx} ! nhe wileeß tu us to / tu allo ih-
ten ka tee Saduceeŗi / und nhe ſinni / ka Deewa Raxtʒ unnd Ghra-
mata nhe wiļļ . Negg ghann ſkaidre Deewa Wahrds ẜacka :
Kungs / tawi Nomirruſchi attkall dſiewohß / unnd arr to
Meeſẜu aukſcham ʒellſeeß . Dauds / kattri appakſchan
Semmes ghullaͤdami ghull / attkal usmohdieß / Ʒitti py
muhſchighas Dſiewoſchanas / ʒitti py muhſchighu Nhe-
ghodu
ghodu und Kaunu . Bett Deewa Wahrds muhſcham nhe
maͤlo / Debbeß und Semme ſuddieß / bett Deewa Wahrds
muhſcham nhe ſuhd / jeb tu / O Ʒillwaͤhx / to nhe titʒi / tad to-
maͤhr Deews palleek peetitʒiegs / unnd tawas Nhetitʒibas dehļ
Wings nhe taps par Maͤlkuli . Kapehtʒ tad tu nhe ghribbi ti-
tʒeht to Aukſchamʒellſchanu tawas Meeſẜas ? Kaß to nhe titʒ / taß
nhe ſinna / ka Deews wiß⸗ſpehʒiegs / und warr darriet wiß /
ko Wings ghrib Debbeſẜies und wirſẜon Sem̃es . Winja
Spaͤhx und Stipprums gir tick leels / ka nhe buhß nheneeka
truhkt / kapehtʒ Wings tad nhe warraͤtu weenu Mirroni attkal
dſiewu darriet ? Nhe gir Deewam taß ghruht bijiß / no nheneka to
raddiet / kaß taggad gir ; kapehtʒ Wings tad nhe ſpaͤhtu{ſpehtu} to attkall
preeſcha neſt und weſt / kaß jaw pirmahk gir bijis ? Tu allo / O
ghrehʒiegs Ʒillwehx / unnd nhe prohti to leelu Ghodu / ar kattru
Deews abdahwenahß eekſchan tahß muhſchighas Dſiewoſcha-
nas tohß / kattri eekſchan to titʒ . Tee Saduceeŗi ſchkitta / ja ʒitta
Dſiewoſchana ghaiditiņa gir / tad ihten tha tee laulahti Ļaudis
kohpà dſiewohß / ka tee ẜcheitan gir dſiewojuẜchi ẜchinny Paſẜau-
leh . Nhe / Manni Draughi / tee Deewa⸗ißraͤdſaͤti buhß liedſa
teems Deewa Engheļeems / to nhe buhß toͤw ta ẜapraſt / ihten ka
buhtu muhſẜa Meeſẜa par Gharru pahrwehrta / bett tha leela
Ghoda dehļ / tohp taß tha ẜatʒietʒ / arr kattru Deews ẜawus Dee-
wabijatajus abdahwenahß . Winji ſpiedehß{ſpeidehß} ka ta / Ꞩaule /
und tad tee liedſaͤni kļuhß tai apſkaidrotai Meeſẜi JEſu
CHRJſti / Tee pillnighe Deewu adſieß / ka Wings gir /
und pallix py tahß Engeļo Draudes muhſchighe . Tu
allo / O tu ghrehʒiegs Ʒillwehx / und nhe ſinni Deewa Paddomu
und Dabbu . Wings nhe gir weens Deews to Nomir-
roẜcho / bett to Dſiewo . Nu gir Wings irr muhſẜo Deews /
tapehtʒ jo irr mums buhß dſiewoht . Attſtahjeeß tu no Ghreh-
keems / ja tu to nhe darrieſẜi / tad tu arridſan ghann aukſchamʒellſ-
ẜeeß
ẜeeß Paſtarà deenà / bett tu tapẜi ẜohdietʒ / uñ wiſẜeems Waͤlleems
par Elles⸗paggal preekſcha meſts / tu dexi / und muſcham nhe ẜadexi .
Kad nu JEſus tha by teems Saduceeŗeems to Mutt aiß-
bahſis und tohß kluſẜenahjiß / ẜapullʒejahß tee Wariſeeŗi / ſchkißda-
mi / Chriſto leelu kaunu darriet . Vnnd weens ſtarrpan teems /
weens Raxtamahʒetaiß kahrdenaja to / ghribbaͤdams to ißklauſ-
ẜiet / arrieg taß tick dauds ſinnatu adbilldeht / unnd ẜacka : Meiſte-
ri / kurrſch gir taß auxtakaiß Baußliß eekſchan to Bauß-
lu ? Taß Blehdis dohd labbu Wahrdu / winjam miexta Mehle /
ẜautʒ to Kunghu JEſum par Meiſteri / par Mahʒetaju / ka wings
arridſan gir / bett tomehr ẜawà Prahtà taß dohmaja / Winjam
Kaunu darriet . Kad taß Prettibeneex ẜawu Ballxny mie-
lighu darra / tad nhe titʒi winjam / aiſto ẜeptinjas nhe ghan-
tas Leetas gir winjà Ꞩirrdy .
Taß Kungs JEſus / katters wiſẜus paſinna / unnd nhe
by winjam waijagha / ka kaßlabba Leeʒibu dohtu no ka-
du Ʒillwaͤku / aiſto Wings ghann ſinnaja kaß Ʒillwaͤkà
by / adbilldeja und ẜatʒija : Toͤw buhß Deewu tawu Kunghu
mieļoht no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds / no wiſẜas Dwehſẜeles / no wiſ-
ẜu Prahtu ; Taß gir taß auxtakaiß Baußliß . Bett taß
ohtris gir tam liedſaͤns : Toͤw buhß tawu Tuwaku mie-
ļoht ka toͤw paſſchu . Ꞩchinnieß diwejohß Baußließ kar-
rajahß wiß Baußliß / und tee Proweeteß . Wiß ko Deews
mums pawehlejis darriet / taß ſtahw ẜchinnieß diwejahß Leetahß .
Toͤw buhß Deewu und tawu Tuwaku Ʒillwaͤku mieļoht . Dee-
wu / no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds / Dwehſẜeleß und Prahtu / ja tu ʒittu kahdu
Leetu auxtake mieļo ka Deewu tad tu jaw eſẜi noſeedſis / unnd ja
tu arridſan ʒittu kahdu Leetu jo tick ļohte mieļo / ka Deewu / tad
eſẜi tu arridſan jaw ghraͤkojiß . Deews nhe ghribbahß ẜoͤw kall-
pojams ar puß Ꞩirrdi / bett no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds . Tapehtʒ irr JE-
ſus Chriſtus ẜacka : Kaß Taͤhwu und Maht wairahk mie-
ļo
ļo nhe ka mann / taß nhe gir mannas wehrtes . Vnd ta-
dehļ arridſan taß Kungs Chriſtus ſcho Baußli to auxtaku ẜautʒ /
ka ʒittʒ auxtahx unnd leelahx Debbeſẜieß unnd wirß Semmes nhe
gir ka Deews / Wings gir leels / unnd darra Brienumus /
unnd Wings ween gir Deews / ẜacka taß ẜwehtʒ Konings
Dawids . Vnd tawu Tuwaku buhß toͤw mieļoht / ka ẜoͤw paſ-
ẜchu . Ꞩchiß Baußliß gir tam pirmajam liedſaͤns / Aiſto weens
Kungs und Deews gir abbejus Baußluß dewiß / und taß Kungs
katters pawehļ ẜoͤw mieļoht / taß patʒ pawehļ arridſan to Tuwa-
ku Ʒillwaͤku mieloht . Vnnd ka Deews ẜoͤw ghribbahß mielo-
johts no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds / no wiſẜas Dwehſẜeleß / no wiſẜu Prahtu /
tha ghribb und pawehl Wings arridſan to Tuwaku mieļoht / Ja /
ka ickkattriß ẜoͤw labbe wehļ / tha buhß tam arridſan ẜawam Tu-
wakam wiß labb wehleht . Vnnd ka Deews teems ẜohla labbe
darriet / ẜcheit laiʒighe / und turr muhſchighe / kattri Winju mielo ;
attkal / kattri no Ꞩirrds tam nhe kallpo / tohß draude Wings
ſcheit laiʒighe / bett wiß wairahk turr muhſchighe ẜohdiet : ihten
tha taß patʒ Deews ẜohla teems labbe attkall darriet / kattri tam
Tuwakam labbe darra / unnd kattri ẜawu Tuwaku eenied / tohß
ghribb Wings attkal eniedeht ; aiſto ar to paſſchu Maͤhru / ar
kattru juhs ißmerjohſẜeeta{ißmaͤrohſẜeeta} / taps jums attkall eemaͤhŗohtʒ .
Mahʒais nu ẜcheitan / Manns Draugs / unnd paturri /
Mieļo Deewu / nhe ween arr Mutt / unnd arr Mehl / bett no
Ꞩirrds dibben . Ko pallieds taß / ka tu leelijeeß arr Mutt / tu
mielojohtʒ Deewu / und tawa Ꞩirrds nhe ſinna nhe neeka no tah-
deems Wahrdeems . Daſſch arridſan ẜacka / Eß mieļo Deewu /
eet arridſan Baſniʒà / mahk krahßnus Pahtarus / ja / wings eet irr
py Dewu Ghalldu ; Bett wings gir tomehr Burrwiß / Ꞩahls⸗
Puhſchlaͤtaiß / jeb Wings tahdus Waͤlla Peſtelus meckle /
Wings gir Maͤllkuliß / nhe klauſẜa Kunghu / nei Taͤhwu /
nei Maht / nei Raddu / kaß winjam labbe mahʒa / wings rei-
jahß
jahß ka Ꞩunß und barrahß / unnd kaujahß ar ẜawu Kaimiņu / gir
Beßkauniß / Mauko⸗jaͤhgheris / Laulibas Pahrlauſetais / Sag-
gliß / Willteneex / abmaͤlo ẜawu Tuwaku / ſchkenne und lamma
to / unnd ka Wings tickai dabbuit warraͤtu / labpraht Wings
jaͤmbtu ẜawa Tuwaka Aehkaß / Lohpus / Manntu und attwilltu
tam wiſẜu Ꞩaim . Vnnd tomaͤhr{tomehr} leelijahß Wings / ka Wings
Deewu mielojohtʒ . Ghribbi tu / Manns Draugs / teeſcham ẜa-
tʒiet / Es mielo Deewu / tad buhß toͤw arridſan to darriet / ko Deews
no toͤw ghribb / und ka tu nhe warri taggad no Ghrehkeems pahr-
jaͤmbtʒ unnd ẜamaitahtʒ to darriet / tad buhß toͤw tomehr tawà
Ꞩirrdy Deewu tawu Kunnghu und winja Wahrdu turreht und
mieloht / ghribbaͤdams und ʒeek ſpaͤhdams{ſpeedams} pehtʒ to dſiewoht / ka tu
warri arr to ẜwehtu Koninju Dawid ẜatʒiet : No wiſẜas Ꞩirrds
mielo eß toͤw / Kunngs / unnd arr to ẜwehtu Apuſtuli Pehteri :
Kunngs / tu ſinni wiſẜas Leetas / tu ſinni / ka eß toͤw mielo .
Ja tu Deewu mielohſẜi no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds / tad tu arridſan winja
Wahrdu turrehſẜi / ka Chriſtus JEſus ẜacka : Kaß mann mie-
lo / taß mannu Wahrdu turrehß . Mielohſẜi tu Deewu no
wiſẜas Ꞩirrds / tad tu tieſche nhe ghrehkohſẜi / unnd ar taweems
Ghrehkeems winju nhe apkaitenahſẜi . Labbs Baͤhrns ẜawu
Taͤhwu mielodams / darra ʒeek ſpehdams / ko Taͤhws / Mahte
ghribb : Ey tu / Manns Draugs / unnd darri tu arridſan tha .
Mielo tawu Tuwaku / ka ẜoͤw paſſchu . Jckkattris Ʒillwehx
gir taws Tuwakaiß / kaß tawu Pallighu ghribb . Wings ihten
tha no Deewu gir raddietʒ / ka irr tu / JEſus Chriſtus gir winju ih-
ten tick ghrute unnd ẜuhre no tahß Elles und tha Waͤlla Wallſti-
bas atpeſtijiß / ka irr toͤw . Kapehtʒ tad tu winjam ghribbi att-
rauteeß ? Bett mielo to / nhe Ļaudeems raͤdſoht / bett ka toͤw paſ-
ſchu . Tu ghribbi / ka ʒitteem Ļaudeems toͤw buhß mieloht ; ko
tu nu ghribbi / ko ʒitteem Ļaudeems toͤw buhß darriet /
to buhß toͤw arridſan winjeems darriet . Tu ẜoͤw paſ-
ſchu
ſchu mielojeeß nhe arr willtighu Ꞩirrdi / nhe ween arr Mehl /
ar Wahrdeems / bett itt teeſcham / und no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds : ihten
tha mieļo tu arridſan tawu Tuwaku / nhe ween ar Wahr-
deems / unnd ar Mehl / bett ar Darrbu unnd itt patteeß .
Tu mielojeeß ẜoͤw paſſchu nhe raͤmdaͤne / bett itt karſte / und tahda
Mielaͤſtiba nhe ghroſahß / ta palleek ; ihten tha mieļo tu arridſan
tawu Tuwaku / ka taß ẜwehtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils mahʒa : Tai
Mielibai nhe buhß willtighai buht . Tu / O Ʒillwehx / ẜoͤw
paſſchu tha mielojeeß / ka tu to / kaß toͤw Ļaun gir unnd Nhelaim
darriet warraͤtu / ʒeek ſpehdams / no toͤw nowehrß / und us to Lab-
bumu dſenneeß : ihten tha darri tu arridſan tawam Tuwakam /
und turri tahdu Ꞩirrdi prett winju :
Toͤw buhß tam wehlet wiſẜu Labb /
Ka toͤw tawa Ꞩirrds paſcham darra .
Vnd to gir toͤw pawehlejis Deews taws Kungs / ar ſcheems
Wahrdeems : Toͤw buhß to darriet : Toͤw buhß tawu Tu-
waku mieloht / ka ẜoͤw paſſchu / aiſto eß aͤßmu taß Kungs .
Chriſtus JEſus ẜacka : Taß gir manns Baußliß / ka juhß
weens ohtru mielojeteeß / ka eß jumms mielojiß aͤßmu .
Vnd attkal : Weenu jaunu Baußlu dohmu eß jumms /
ka jums weens ohtru mieloht buhß / ka eß jums mielojiß
aͤßmu / py to ickkattriß paſieß / ka juhß manni Mahʒekli
eſẜeeta / ja juhß Mielaͤſtibu ẜawà ſtarrpà turreeta . Vnd
taß ẜwehtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils mahʒa : Juhß mieli Brahļi /
kallpojeteeß weens ohtram ʒaur tahß Mielaͤſtibas . Ai-
ſto wiß Baußliß tohp weenà Wahrdà peepilldiets arr
to : Mieļo tawu Tuwaku / ka ẜoͤw paſſchu . Bett ja juhß
ẜawà ſtarrpà krimtiſẜeeteeß und reeſẜeeteeß / tad peeluhko-
jeeta / ka juhß ẜawà ſtarrpà nhe tohpeeta ap⸗ahſti . Vnd
kaß nu Deewu unnd ẜawu Tuwaku Ʒillwaͤku nhe mieļo / bett to
eenied / wiſẜenadohß Ghraͤkohß dſiewo / und eekſchan teems ẜoͤw
wah-
wahļajahß{ļajahß} und wahrtahß / ka Weppris Pallty / Deewu apkaitina /
und ẜawam Tuwakam Ʒillwaͤkam Baͤhdas darra ; patteeß tam
nhe buhß Daļļas eekſchan Debbeſẜo wallſtibas . Tadehļ / M.D.
laid allaſch tawahß Auſẜieß attſkanneht to Maʒibu : Toͤw buhß
Deewu tawu Kunnghu mieloht no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds / no
wiſẜas Dwehſẜeles / no wiſẜu Prahtu / und tawu Tuwaku
ka ẜoͤw paſſchu .
Ohtran kahrtan laideeta mums nu arridſan klauſẜiteeß / ka
JEſus Chriſtus tohß Wariſeeŗus waiʒa / no ẜoͤw paſẜchu / unnd
ẜacka / kad tee wiſẜi kohpà by : Ko ſchkeetaht juhß no Chriſto /
ka Daͤhls gir taß ? Taß Raxtamaʒetaiß by pirrmiet Chriſtum
ween waiʒajiß / bett nu waiʒa Chriſtus JEſus wiſẜus Wariſee-
ŗus . Vnd ghribb Wings ẜatʒiet : Juhß Ʒeenighi Kunghi eſẜee-
ta mann pahrklauſẜijuẜchi no to Baußlu / nhe jemmeta par Ļaun /
ka eß jums arridſan ko waiʒahſchu / juhß leelijeteeß dauds no juhſẜu /
Meſẜia / ẜackaita mann / kam peedaͤrr Wings / ka Daͤhls gir taß ?
Tee Wariſeeŗi ẜatʒija : Dawida . Taß by ghann labbe adbill-
dehtʒ / bett nhe pillnighe : No tha Kunngha Chriſti Ʒilwehʒibas
ſinna tee Wariſeeŗi runnaht / bett no Winja Deewibas nhe ſinna
tee nheneeka . Taß gir teeß / ka Chriſtus Dawida Daͤhls gir /
aiſto no Dawida tha Koninja Ʒilltas gir Wings ka Ʒillwaͤhx{Ʒillwehx}
ʒehleeß / ka irr taß Apuſtuls Pahwils ẜacka : Wings gir pee-
dſimmis no to Ꞩaͤhklu ( Aſẜini ) Dawida / tahs Meeſẜas
dehl . Bett ka CHriſtus JEſus arridſan Deewa Daͤhls / unnd
patteeß Deews gir / to tee Ļautiņi nhe ſinna . Tapehtʒ Chriſtus
ẜcheitan wehl ẜacka : Ka tad taß nahkahß / ka Dawids to
Gharrà par Kunnghu ẜautʒ / ẜatʒidams . Taß Kunngs
( Deews taß Taͤhws ) ẜatʒija us mannu Kunghu / ( to Meſ-
ẜiam / to Kunghu Chriſtum JEſum ) ẜehdeeß pa mannu lab-
bu Rohku / teekams eß tawus Eenaidneekus leeku par
Pamaͤßlu tawahms Kahjahms . Ja to nu Dawids
par
par Kunghu ẜautʒ / ka gir taß tad winja Daͤhls . JESVS
Chriſtus ghribb tick dauds ẜatʒiet : Eß dſirrſchu / ka juhß Wari-
ſeeŗi ſchkeetaht / taß Meſẜias / Chriſtus aͤſẜohtʒ Dawida Daͤhls /
und patteeß Ʒillwaͤhx / unnd taß gir teeß ; bett winjam buhß arri-
dſan patteeſẜe Deewam buht ʒittade taß Konings Dawids nhe
buhtu to ẜawu Kunnghu ẜautʒiß . Aiſto muhſcham taß nhe gir
dſirrdaͤhtʒ / ka Taͤhws ẜawu Daͤhlu / par Kunghu / und par ẜawu
Kunnghu buhtu ẜautʒis . Aran to by jums paſſcheems praẜt / ka
Chriſtus nhe ween tiers Ʒillwaͤhx / bett arridſan ihſtaͤns Deews
aͤſẜohtʒ . Vñ nhe weens nhe ſinnaja tam kahdu Wahrdu ad-
billdeht / und nhe drieſteja arridſan no tahß Deenas tam
wairs jautaht . Tee Wariſeeŗi ſchkittahß Chriſto JEſu Kaunu
darriet / bett Wings darra ẜcheems leelu Kaunu .
Mahʒais tu / M.D. tawu Kunghu JEſu Chriſtum pa-
reiſe adſiet / aiſto eekſchan to tu Ꞩirrds⸗Preeku / Schaͤlaſtibu
und to muhſchighu Dſiewoſchanu attrohdi . Wings gir Deews
unnd Ʒillwaͤhx / ka taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewangeliſts Jahnis ẜacka : Taß
Wahrds ( taß gir / Deewa Daͤhls ) tappa Meeſẜa / unnd dſie-
woja muhſẜu ſtarrpà / und mehß redſejam winja Ghodu /
weenu Ghodu / ka tha weenigha⸗peedſimbta Daͤhla no
Taͤhwu / pillu ſchaͤlaſtibas und Taißnibas .
Ja / M.D. kad toͤw by pallidſaͤtam und peſtitam tapt / no
to Ghraͤku Naſtu / und tahß Elles Mohkahms / tad by tawam
Peſtitajam buht Dawida Daͤhlam / taß gir / winjam by pat-
teeſẜe Ʒillwaͤkam buht . Aiſto taß taißnis Deews by ẜatʒijis us to
Ʒillwaͤku : Kuŗŗu deenu tu no to aisleektu Kohku ehd / buhß
toͤw itt teeſcham mirrt . Bett nu bya taß Ʒillwaͤhx ſcho Deewa /
Wahrdu pahrkahpis / und tadehļ buhtu arridſan wiſẜa Paſẜaule /
taß gir / wiſẜi Ļaudis Paſẜauleh dſiewodami muhſchighe tam
Waͤllam nodohtini bijuſchi tam by tohß ſpiedſinaht unnd wahr-
dſinaht Elles Vgguny / kad JEſus CHriſtus nhe buhtu muhſẜu
Meeſẜu
Meeſẜu unnd Aſẜini usjehmis / unnd Ʒillwaͤhx tappis . Bett ka
Wings nu to gir darrijis / unnd muhſẜo dehļ eekſcham ẜchahß
Paſẜaules nahʒis / und weens Ʒillwaͤka Baͤhrns tappis / tad ſchaͤh-
lo Deews mums ẜawa Daͤhla dehļ . No tahdu leetu runna taß
ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pawils ẜatʒidams : Ka ʒaur weena ( Ʒillwaͤka )
Ghraͤku ta Paſudenaſchana par wiſẜeems Ʒillwaͤkeems
gir nahkuſẜi ; tha gir arridſan ʒaur weena ( Ʒillwaͤka ) Taiß-
nibu ta Noteeẜaſchana tahß dſiewibas par wiſẜeems Ʒill-
waͤkeems nahkuſẜi . Vnd ka ʒaur weena Ʒillwaͤka Nheklau-
ẜiſchanu dauds Ghreʒeneeki tappuſchi gir ; tha arridſan
ʒaur weena ( Ʒillwaͤka ) Paklauſẜiſchanu tohp dauds Taißni .
Nhe buhtu / JEſus Chriſtus / taws Peſtitais / Ʒillwaͤhx tappis /
tad nhe buhtu wings warrejis tahß ruhktas Mohkas ʒeeſt / unnd
mirrt / und ʒaur ẜawu Nahwu mums no tahß muhſchighas Nah-
wes attpeſtiet . Aiſto Chriſtus gir nokautʒ pehtʒ to Meeſẜu . Nu
warri tu / O Ʒillwaͤhx / ar preeʒighu Ꞩirrdi ẜatʒiet : Chriſtus
JEſus gir nomirris muhſẜo ghraͤko dahļ / unnd ta Nahwe
gir aprieta eekſchan tahß Vswarreſchanas .
Tha lieds arridſan / ja toͤw by peſtitam tapt no tahms muh-
ſchighams Mohkahms / tad by tawam Peſtitajam buht Dawi-
da Kunngham / taß gir / ihſtaͤnam / muhſchigham / wiß⸗ſpehʒi-
gham Deewam / ʒittade nhe buhtu Wings to leelu Nhelaim no
toͤw warrejis nowehrſt / und tahß{tohß} Dahwanus / kattras{kattrus} tu biji pa-
mettiß / nhe buhtu Wings toͤw attkal warrejis att⸗dabbuit . Ab-
dohma patʒ / M.D. ka ghruhti und leeli ghruhti by tawi Ghraͤki ?
kahda by ta Lahſta / kattru Deews by us teems Ghreʒeneekeems
litʒis / kad wings ẜacka : Noladaͤhtam buhß buht ick⸗kattram /
kaß Deewa Wahrdu pahrkahp ? Kaß warreja Deewa Duß-
mibu pa⸗neẜt ? Ka ghaidija taß Waͤlls us muhſẜu Dwehſẜel und
Meeſẜu / ka wings mums warraͤtu ẜawohß Naggohß dabbuit ?
Kaß warraͤtu toͤw / O tu nabbahgs Ʒillwaͤhx / no tahdas leelas
Nhe-
Nhelaimes und baͤhdeems peſtiet und pallidſeht ? Nhe kahda rad-
dita leeta / ney Debbeſẜies ney wirß Semmes ſpehja tohß ghraͤkus
delldeht / Deewa dußmibu remmdeht / unnd tha Waͤlla Wallſti-
bu unnd Spaͤhku ẜmilldſinaht . Tapehtʒ by tawam Peſtitajam
buht patteeß⸗Deewam / ka Wings toͤw pillnighe attpeſtiet / unnd
no tha ſtippra bruņņota Waͤlla Warru ißraut / und eekſchan
Debbeſẜa⸗Wallſtibas ee⸗waͤſt warraͤtu .
Juhß ſinnaht paſẜchi / M.D. kad kaßlabban tahdus Ļaudis
ghribb ẜaliedſenaht / kattri Eenaidà dſiewo / tad buhß tam wee-
nam tick labb ka ohtram Labbs Draugs buht . Nu by ſtarp Deewu
und Ʒillwaͤku ta wiß⸗leelaka Eenaidiba laͤhkuſẜeeß . Ja tad nu tam
apkaitenahtam Deewam attkal by ẜaliedſenatam unnd ẜadarraͤ-
tam tapt / ar to Ʒillwaͤku / kaß Deewu by apkaitenajis / tad by Je-
ſus Chriſtus buht Draugs irr Deewa irr Ʒillwaͤka . Nu warri /
tu Ʒillwaͤhx / ar preeʒighu Mutt ẜatʒiet unnd dſeedaht : Redſi /
Deews gir mans Peſtitais . Deews gir ẜawu Drauds
attpirʒeeß ʒaur ẜawu paſſchu Aſẜini . Tawa Ꞩirrds ſinna nu
itt teeſcham / ka tu pillnighe attpeſtietʒ eſẜi . Aiſto mehß aͤſẜam
ẜaliedſenati ar Deewu ʒaur to Nahwu ẜawa Daͤhla . Tu /
O Ʒillwaͤhx / warri ẜatʒiet ar to ſwahtu Apuſtulu{Aupuſtulu} Pawilu : Dee-
wa Daͤhls gir mann mieļojis / unnd gir ẜoͤw paſſchu man-
nis dehļ nodehweeß . Vnnd taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Jahnis ẜa-
cka : Eekſchan to gir attradijuſẜeeß Deewa Mielaͤſtiba prett
mums / ka Deews ẜawu weenu⸗peedſimbtu Daͤhlu ẜuhtijis
gir / ka mums ʒaur to dſiewoht buhß .
Taß Kunngs JEſus gir arridſan Chriſtus / taß gir /
taws Mahʒetais unnd Konings unnd Wirſẜeneeex . Wings
mahʒa toͤw / ka Deews taß debbeſẜo Taͤhws no ẜirrds dibben
toͤw mieļo / unnd to paſſchu Mahʒibu gir wings pawehlejis ẜa-
weems Mahʒekļeems pehtʒ ẜawas Aukſcham⸗ʒellſchanas wiſẜai
Paſẜaulei paẜluddenaht / ẜatʒidams : Eita projam wiſẜà
Paſẜauleh
Paſẜauleh / unnd mahʒeeta wiſẜus Ļaudis / und Chriſtijee-
ta tohß eekſchan to Wahrdu tha Taͤhwa / unnd tha Daͤh-
la / unnd tha ẜwaͤhta Gharra / unnd mahʒeeta toͤß tur-
reht wiß / ko Eß jums pa⸗wehlejis aͤßmu . Ko tu M.D. nu
no Deewu und winja Wahrdu ſinni / to patteitʒ tawam Peſtita-
jam und Mahʒetajam Chriſto .
CHriſtus / ẜacku eß / gir Wings / aiſto Wings luhds
preekſch toͤw . Aiſto tha wings luhgdams ẜacka : O Taͤhws /
eß luhdſu preekſch teems / kattrus tu mann dehwis eſẜi /
unnd nhe⸗ween preekſch teems / bett arridſan preekſchan
teems / kattri ʒaur winjo ( to Mahʒetajo ) Wahrdu eek-
ſchan man titʒehß . Vnd py ta Kruſta Kohku ẜatʒija Wings :
Taͤhws / peedohd teems / aiſto tee nhe ſinna / ko tee darra .
Kaß gir tee / preekſch kattreems Chriſtus luhds ? Negg gir tee win-
ja Waideneeki ? unnd kattri to py to Kruſtu pee⸗nagglojuẜchi
by ? Aiſto tee Kaŗŗa⸗wieri muhſcham nhe buhtu CHriſtum py
Kruſtu pee⸗ẜittuſchi / kad tas Semmes⸗Ꞩohghis Pontius Pila-
tus nhe buhtu to pa⸗wehlejis . Pilatus nhe buhtu to pawehle-
jis / kad tee Juddi nhe buhtu braͤhkuſchi : Ꞩitt to kruſtà / Ꞩitt
to kruſtà . Vnnd ko buhß dauds ẜatʒiet / nei tee Juddi / nei
Pilatus buhtu ko warrejis baudiet{baudeht} / kad muhſẜo Ghraͤhki
nhe buhtu us Jeſu Chriſti Mugguru ghullejuẜchi : Tapehtʒ
luhds wings arridſan preekſch mums / und warram mehs ẜatʒiet :
Nu mehß aͤſẜam taißnoti ʒaur to Titʒibu / tad gir mums
Meers ar Deewu ʒaur muhſẜu Kunnghu JEſum Chriſt .
Taws Wirẜeneex gir JESVS CHriſtus arridſan /
aiſto / ka wings tam Waͤllam to ſpaͤhku pa⸗jehmis gir / und toͤw
no Waͤlla Wallſtibas atpeſtijis ; tha ghribb Wings nu no toͤw
ka toͤw winjam buhß kallpoht eekſchan Ꞩwehtibas unnd
Taißnibas / kattra winjam pattick / Tam paſſcham muhſ-
ẜam Kunngham JEſu Chriſto gir Ghods und Ꞩlawa muh-
ſchighe muhſcham / Amen .
Ewan-
Evangelium am neunʒehen-
den Sontag nach Trinitatis /
Matth. 9.
To ẜwaͤhtu Ewangelium / ka taß ſchehliegs Kunngs JE-
ſus Chriſtus weenam Maͤllmaͤna⸗ẜehrdſigham Ʒill-
waͤkam tohß Ghraͤkus peedohd / und pehtʒ arridſan
py Meeſẜas pallieds / unnd to waͤſẜalu darra / apraxta
taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewangeliſts Mattheus / ẜawà Ghramatà
Dewità Weetà / unnd ſkann tee Wahrdi juhſẜà Wallo-
dà tha :
JEſus
JEſus kahpe Laiwà / unnd
ʒehlehß attkal pahre / unnd nahʒe
ẜawà Pili . Vnnd raughi / tad
neſẜe tee weenu Maͤllmaͤna⸗ẜehr-
dſighu / taß ghulleja Ghulltà . Kad
nu Jeſus winjo Titʒibu redſeja / ẜatʒija taß us to Maͤll-
maͤna⸗ẜehrdſighu / turrais labbu Prahtu / manns
Daͤhls / tawi Ghraͤki gir toͤw peedohti . Vnd raugi / ʒit-
ti ſtarrpan teems Raxtamaʒetajeems runnaja ẜawà
ſtarrpà : Ꞩchiß ẜaimo Deewu . Bett kad JEſus win-
jo Dohmas redſeja / ẜatʒija taß : Kapehtʒ domajeeta
juhß tick ļaun juhſẜahß Ꞩirrdihs ? Kaß gir laͤhtake
ẜatʒiet : Toͤw gir tawi Ghraͤki peedohti / jeb ẜatʒiet :
Ʒellees / unnd ſtaigha ? Bett ka juhß ſinnaht / ka ta
Ʒillwaͤka Daͤhlam Warra gir wirs Semmes tohß
Ghraͤkus peedoht / ẜatʒija taß us to Maͤllmaͤna⸗ẜehr-
dſighu : Ʒellees aukſcham / jemm tawu Ghulltu / und
ey Mahjahß . Vnnd taß ʒehlehß aukſcham unnd
ghaja Mahjahß . Kad tee Ļaudis to redſeja / brino-
jahß tee / unnd teitʒe Deewu / katters tahdu Spaͤhku
tem Ʒillwaͤkeem dewis gir .
MJeļi Draughi / Ꞩchiß ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewangeli-
ums peedaͤrr eekſchan to treſſchu Lohʒekli muhſẜas
ẜwaͤhtas Titʒibas / kur mehß ẜackam : Eß titʒu Pee-
doẜchanu to Ghraͤko . Taß ſchehliegs Deews
ickdeenas eekſchan tahs Chriſtitas Draudſibas wiſẜeems
Titʒi-
Titʒigheems wiſẜus Ghraͤkus baggatighe peedohd . Aiſto ih-
ten ka taß Kungs Chriſtus ẜchim Nheweſẜeļam tohß Ghraͤ-
kus pee⸗dohd / ẜatʒidams : Turrais labbu Prahtu / manns
Daͤhls / tawi Ghraͤki gir toͤw pee⸗dohti / unnd tha pirrmahk
to Ꞩackni wiſẜenadas Nhelaimes und Nheweſẜelibas ißrau / aiſto
to Ghraͤko / to Ghraͤko dehļ Deews to Ʒillwaͤhku pahr-
mahʒa und ẜohda / ka winja Skaiſtums iß⸗taͤhraͤhtʒ tohp /
ka no Kuẜtoņeems / ẜacka taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Konings Dawids : ihten
tha taß patʒ Kungs JEſus CHriſtus teems Baßniʒas Taͤh-
weems tahdu Spaͤhku unnd Warru dehwis / teems nab-
bagheems Ghrehʒeneekeems tohß Ghraͤkus peedoht / und
teems nhetitʒigheems nhe peedoht . Vnnd ko tee peedohd
eekſchan to Wahrdu JEſu / to peedohd arridſan Deews
Debbeſẜies .
Mehß ghribbam ẜchim brieſcham mahʒiteeß / ko ick⸗kat-
tram Chriſtitam Ʒillwaͤkam no to Ghraͤko Peedohẜcha-
nu ſinnaht unnd titʒeht buhß / ka taß arridſan warraͤtu ẜa-
wu Ꞩirrdi usrunnaht und ẜatʒiet / Turrais labbu Prah-
tu / Manna Ꞩirrds / tawi Ghraͤki gir toͤw peedohti .
Taß Kunngs JESVS Chriſtus / kattram Spaͤhx unnd
Waļļa gir / tohß Ghraͤkus peedoht / taß ghribbaͤtu mums wiſ-
ẜeems arridſan muhſẜus Ghraͤkus peedoht / und ar ẜawu Ꞩwaͤhtu
Gharru mums klaht ſtahweht / Amen .
MJeļi Draughi / to Ghraͤko Peedohẜchanu ẜacka taß ẜwaͤhtʒ
Apuſtuls Pawils aͤſẜam weenu dahrghu ʒeenighu
Wahrdu / mums buhß to Mahʒibu auxte turreht unnd
ʒeeniet / tapehtʒ arridſan ick⸗kattram Chriſtitam Ʒillwaͤkam no
Ꞩirrds ẜcho Mahʒibu waͤhrà jembt buhß .
Pirrmahk maiʒais / Manns Draugs / Kaß taß gir / kam
taß Spaͤhx gir Ghraͤkus peedoht unnd attlaiſt ? Taß gir
taws
taws und manns Kungs und Peſtitais JEſus Chriſtus . Aiſto
taß patʒ ẜacka us to Maͤllmaͤna⸗ẜehrdſighu : Turrais labbu
Prahtu / Manns Daͤhls / tawi Ghraͤki gir toͤw peedohti .
Tohß Wahrdus warr wings teeẜcham runnaht / laid tee Wari-
ſeeŗi Mutt ghrohſa / ka ghribbaͤdami / aiſto taß Kungs JEſus
nhe gir ween kahds tiers Ʒillwaͤhx / bett arridſan ihſtaͤns Deews /
ka Wings to parahda unnd mahʒa ar to Brienumu / ẜcho Nhe-
weſẜeli / kattru tſchettri Wieri neſẜe / waͤſẜaͤlu darridams / ka taß
tudeļļ aukſcham ʒehlehß / ẜawu Ghulltu ẜajehme / us ẜawahms
Kahjahms ſtahweja und noghaja kur ghribbaͤdams / ihten ka nhe
buhtu tam muhſcham nhe kahdas Ꞩahpes bijuẜchi .
Tha gir nu taß Kunngs JEſus patteeß Deews unnd Ʒill-
waͤhx / und tapehtʒ Wings arridſan tohß Ghraͤkus teems Ghreh-
ʒeneekeems peedoht und attlaiſt warr .
Vnnd ka Deewam ween peedaͤrr tohß Ghraͤkus peedoht /
to warram mehß aran to ẜapraſt / kad mehß apdomajam / pretti
kam mehß ghraͤkojam . Nu pahrkahpjam mehß nhekahda Ʒillwaͤ-
ka Baußlu / bett paſſcha Deewa Wahrdu unnd Baußlu / pretti
Deewu mehß ghraͤkojam / tadehļ Winjam ween Waļļa gir /
muhſẜus Ghraͤkus mums peedoht . To abdohmaja taß Konings
Dawids / tapehtʒ Wings ẜacka : Prett toͤw ween ( O Deews )
aͤßmu eß ghraͤkojis / und nhe pareiſe preekſch toͤw darrijis .
Redſi / kad kaßlabba toͤw kahdas ẜimbtas Mahrkas buhtu parra-
da / und ʒitts ghribbaͤtu tam Parradneekam attlaiſt und peedoht to
Parradu / tad buhtu tu und taws Parradneex peewilltʒ : tu ẜatʒitu /
kaß ẜweſſcham ar mannu Naudu ja⸗darra / ko Wings mañu Nau-
du ʒittam ſchkingko ? Jhten tha ẜchinny leetà arridſan noteek / kaß
dſiŗŗahß beß Deewu ʒittam to Ghraͤko⸗Parradu attlaiſt / taß
wiļļ / und kaß us to wiļļahß / taß patteeß peewilltʒ . Taß ẜwaͤhtʒ
Apuſtuls unnd Ewangeliſts Jahnis ẜacka : Tee Ghraͤki gir
Pahrkahpẜchana to Deewa Baußlo / Wiß kaß prett Deewu
unud
und winja Wahrdu gir / taß gir Ghraͤhx . Ja tad nu kaßlabba
ghribb Ghraͤkus peedoht / tam buhß pa⸗rahdiet / ka Winjam
Waļļa gir par Deewa Baußlu / no to ko attlaiſt . Bett to nhe
warr nhe weens Ʒillwaͤhx / no Taͤhwu unnd Mahtes Paſẜauleh
dſimmis teickteeß . Tapehtʒ attkal Deewam ween taß Ghohds
pee⸗daͤrr / Ghraͤkus peedoht .
To Ghohdu dehwe Deewam Moſes / ẜatʒidams : Taß
Kungs gir paʒeetiegs und no leelas Schaͤlaſtibas / Wings
peedohd Noſeedſibu unnd Pahrkahpſchanu : O Kunngs
Deews eſẜi ſchehliegs pehtʒ tawas leelas Schaͤlaſtibas .
Konings Dawids ẜacka : Py toͤw / Deews gir Peedoh-
ẜchana / ka toͤw byteeß buhß . Patʒ Deews ẜacka ʒaur to Pro-
weetu Eſaia : Eß / Eß delldeju tawus Ghraͤkus ka to Mig-
glu / und tawus Noſeghummus ka tahß Padebbeſẜes . Taß
ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils ẜacka : Deews ween gir taißnis /
unnd darra taißnu to / kattram ta Titʒiba gir us JEſu .
Redſi nu / Manns Draugs / ka ʒittam nhe peedaͤrr / Ghraͤ-
kus peedoht no paſſchu Spaͤhku unnd Waļļas / ka tickai Dee-
wam ween . Tapehtʒ luhds Ghraͤko Peedohẜchanu no Deewu /
ẜacki no Ꞩirrds : Deews eſẜi mann ſchehliegs pehtʒ tawas
Lehnibas / unnd dellde mannus Ghraͤkus pehtʒ tawas lee-
tas Schaͤlaſtibas . Ja tu to darrieſẜi / tad tee Wahrdi irr py toͤw
teeſẜi buhß / kattrus taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Jahnis ẜacka : Kad
mehß ẜawus Ghraͤkus iß⸗ẜackam / tad gir Deews peeti-
tʒiegs unnd taißnis / ka Wings mums tohß Ghraͤkus pee-
dohd / und ſchkieſti mums no wiſẜu Nhetickumu : mehß arri-
dſan dſirrdehſẜim tohß mielighus Wahrdus : Turreeß labbu
Prahtu / manns Daͤhls / manna Meita / tawi Ghraͤki gir
toͤw peedohti .
Ohtrà kahrtà mahʒaiteeß / Kapehtʒ Deews mums
muhſẜus Ghraͤkus peedoht unnd attlaiſt ghribb ? Kadehļ
Wings
Wings ẜatʒiet ghribb / Turreeß labbu Prahtu / manns
Daͤhls ? Diwi letas gir / manni Draughi / kapehtʒ Deews mums
muhſẜus Ghraͤkus ghribb peedoht . Weena gir / Deewa leela
Schaͤlaſtiba / Lehniba unnd Mielaͤſtiba / eekſchan tahß buhß
mums meckleht Ghraͤko peedohſchanu / nhe eekſchan mumms
paſſcheems . Mecklehſẜim mehß to eekſchan mums / tad mehß tickai
Ghraͤkus ween attraſẜim / aiſto wiſẜa muhſẜa Dohmaẜchana
gir nickna no muhſẜas pirrmahß Behrnibas / und Deews
irr py ẜaweems Ꞩwaͤhteems Wainu attrohd / ka tad wiß-
wairahk py mums / kattri to Nhetaißnibu ee⸗dſeŗŗam ka
Vhdeni . Py mums gir wiſẜas Leetas ẜamaitatas / muhſẜo Prahtʒ
gir tumbs / unnd ẜwehſſch no tahß Ghaißmas / Muhſẜo Prahtʒ tur-
raͤhß allaſch prett Deewa Prahtu / unnd nhe ſpeh ẜoͤw paſſcham
paliedſeteeß / ka tam tee Ghraͤki peedohti taptu . Chriſtus JEſus
ẜacka : Beß mannis nhe warreta juhß nhe neeka darriet .
Vnnd tha ẜackoht / jebſche mehs dauds labb darritam : tomaͤhr
mehß ar muhſẜeems Darrbeems Ghraͤko Peedohẜchanu nhe no-
pellnitam . Aiſto wiß ko mehß labb darram / taß nhe gir muhſẜo
Darrbs / bett tha ʒeenigha Ꞩwaͤhta Gharra Darrbs / taß to Lab-
bumu eekſchan mums / unnd ʒaur mums ſtrahda / taß Ꞩwaͤhtʒ
Gharrs darrbojahß / ka mehß ka kahdi Leetas⸗Trauki tahß Ꞩchaͤ-
laſtibas tohpam . Taß gir wiß Deewa / nhe muhſẜo Darrbs / Dee-
wa Dahwana tha gir ; ka warram tad mehß Ghraͤko Peedohẜcha-
nu ar muhſẜeems labbeems Darrbeems nopellniet ? Mums buhß
itt ſchkieſte no mums paſſcheems attkahpteeß / kad mehß Ghraͤko
Peedohẜchanu mecklejam / unnd attſieteeß / ka mehß Ghreʒeneeki
aͤſẜam . Bett eekſchan Deewu / py winja Schaͤlaſtibas / kattra
beß ghallu gir / buhß mums Ghraͤko Peedohẜchanu meckleht . To
mahʒa mums Konings Dawids : Schehliegs und lehniegs
gir taß Kungs / peeʒeetiegs und no leelas Lehnibas / wings
allaſch ar mums nhe bahrſẜeeß / neds muhſcham duß-
mohß
mohß / Wings nhe darra{barra} ar mums ka muhſẜo Ghraͤki gir /
unnd nhe attmaxa mums / ka mehß ar muhſẜeems Noſe-
ghummeems nopellnijuſchi aͤſẜam . Deewa Schaͤlaſtibai
mehß pateitʒam / ka mehß neh{} aͤſẜam ißniekuẜchi / no Winju dabbu-
jam mehß Ghraͤko Peedoẜchanu . Aiſto no Deewa Schaͤla-
ſtibas eſẜeeta juhß ẜwaͤhti tappujuẜchi / ʒaur to Titʒibu / und
taß patʒ nhe gir no jums / Deewa Dahwana gir ta / nhe no
Darrbeems / ka nhe weens warr teickteeß jeb leeliteeß .
Ta ohtra Leeta / kadehļ Deews mums muhſẜus Ghraͤkus
peedohd / gir taß Nopaͤlns muhſẜa Kungha JEſu Chriſti . Daſch
warraͤtu dohmaht : Deews gir ſchehliegs / bett Wings gir arri-
dſan barrgs . Nu / Schaͤlaſtibu paradiet / unnd barrgham buht /
ka warr taß kohpa ſtahweht ? Klauſẜais manns Draugs Deewa
Ghramata / kattra nhe weenu peewiļļ / kaß no to leekahß mahʒi-
teeß / toͤw rahda / weenu Widdetaju / katters Deewa Taißnibai
ghann gir darrijiß / Deewa Baußlu peepilldijiß / unnd Deewam
to Ꞩirrdi pahr⸗jehmiß / ka taß nu projam mums ſchehliegs gir .
Ꞩchiß Widdetaiß gir taß Kungs JESVS Chriſtus / patteeß
Deews und Ʒillwaͤhx{Ʒillwehx} / taß gir muhſẜo labbahd us ẜchahß Paſẜau-
les nahʒiß und Ʒillwaͤhx tappiß arridſan ka Ʒillwaͤhx{Ʒillwehx} ʒeetiß und
nomirris / arr to ẜawu ruhktu Nahwu unnd Mohkahms tohß
Ghraͤkus ißdelldejiß / tohß deßmittus Deewa Baußlus peepilldi-
jiß / Deewa Dußmibu no mums nowehrẜiß / und to muhſchighu
Schaͤlaſtibu und Debbeſẜo⸗Wallſtibu nopellnijiß . Tapehtʒ gir
nu Deewa Daͤhls Ʒillwaͤhx{Ʒillwehx} tappiß / ka Wings warraͤtu ka Ʒill-
waͤhx{Ʒillwehx} ʒeeẜt unnd mirrt . Aiſto Ʒillwaͤhx by ghraͤkojiß / Ʒillwaͤ-
kam by ʒeeſt und{snd} maxaht . Deews by arridſan tam Ʒillwaͤkam
to Baußlu dehwiß / Ʒillwaͤkam by arridſan muhſẜà Weetà pehtʒ
to Baußlu dſiewoht / Ʒillwaͤkam by to Kunghu Chriſtum buht /
ka tam muhſẜo dehļ ſchehligha Ꞩirrds warraͤtu buht . Red-
dſeta / ẜcha dehļ by to Kunghu JEſum Chriſtum Ʒillwaͤkam buht .
Ꞩchim
Ꞩchim muhſẜam Widdetejam by arridſan Deewu buht /
ka Wings patʒ warraͤtu Deewam patickt / und ſchkieſts / und taiß-
niß buhtu / aiſto winjam by mums Ghraͤʒeneekus ſchkieſtiet . Win-
jam by praẜt / ka ghruhti und ẜmaggi to Ghraͤko Naẜta gir / kat-
tru nhe weens tiers Ʒillwaͤhx neẜt warr / Winjam tam Widdeta-
jam by to neẜt ; Winjam by pretti ſtahweht tam Waͤllam / teems
Ghraͤkeems / tai Ellei / und tai muhſchighai Nahwei / unnd tohß
wiſẜus us⸗wahreht . Nhe weens tiers Ʒillwaͤhx tahdu leelu Darr-
bu warreja lieds pillam / wiſẜas Paſẜauleß dehļ noſtrahdaht / red-
ſeeta / tapehtʒ by muhſẜam Widdetajam Deewu buht / ka taß Ʒill-
wehx / jeb ta Ʒillweʒiba eekſchan Chriſto nhe ißniektu .
Ꞩchiß Widdetais / taß Kungs JEſus Chriſtus / gir mums
attpeſtijis no Deewa Dußmibas / tam warram mehß pateickt / ka
mehß to jauku Wahrdu nu dſirrdam : Turreeß labbu Prahtu /
manns Daͤhls / manna Meita .
To abdohmadam ẜacka taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils :
Deews gir to / katters no nhekahdeems Ghraͤkeems ſinna-
ja / muhſẜo dehļ par Ghraͤkeems darrijis / ka mehß eekſchan
to ta Taißniba / kattra preekſch Deewu maxa / taptam .
Vnnd irr taggad wehl Wings ſtahw Deewa unnd muhſẜo ſtarr-
pà / unnd iß⸗luhds mums ; ʒitade mehß nhe drieſtaͤtam Deewa
preekſchà nahkt .
Vs ẜcho Widdetaju paļaujeeß / O Ghrehʒeneex / no wiſẜas
Ꞩirrds / titʒi us to Kunghu JEſum Chriſtum / tad dabbuiſẜi tu
Ghraͤko Peedohẜchanu / unnd to Debbeſẜo Wallſtibu . Aiſto
weens Widdetais gir ſtarrpa Deewu unnd ſtarrp Ʒillwaͤ-
keems / taß Ʒillwehx JEſus Chriſtus / ẜacka taß Apuſtuls
Pahwils .
Bett kaß ghribb ʒittu ʒeļļu
Beß ẜcho Widdetaju ſtaighaht /
To warr ghann dries
Tha
Tha Waͤlla Spaͤhx
Ar ẜawu Willtibu ißbeedenaht .
Treſſchà kahrtà maiʒais / Manns Draugs / Kahda ta
Peedohẜchana gir ? Daſſch warraͤtu dohmaht / arrieg wiſẜi
Ghraͤki tohp peedohti ẜcheitan no Deewu ? jeb buhß mums wehl
par ʒitteems ghann darriet ? Manns Draugs / kad Deews toͤw
tawus Ghraͤkus peedohd / tad peedohd und attlaiſch Wings wiſ-
ẜus / Wiſẜus tawus Ghraͤkus Wings toͤw peedohd . Redſi / ẜchiß
Maͤllmaͤna ẜehrdſiegs Ʒillwaͤhx nhe by ween reis ween ghraͤkojis /
bett ar dauds unnd daſchadeems Ghraͤkeems ẜawu Ꞩirrdi ap-
ghrutenajis / Waͤſẜaͤls buhdams wings nhe by Deewa Wahrdu
labpraht dſirrdejis / Deewam tam wiſẜewallditajam Radditajam
par Waͤſẜaͤlahms Kahjahms und Rohkahms no Ꞩirrds dibben
nhe pateitʒis / ar leelu Ehẜchanu und Dſerrẜchanu / ar leelu Duß-
mu by Wings ẜcho Nheweſẜelibu und Ꞩaͤrrghu dabbujeeß / unnd
ʒittus Ghraͤkus wehl by Wings darrijis / und tomahr taß Kungs
JEſus Winjam wiſẜus Ghraͤkus attlaiſch / und ẜacka : Tawi
Ghraͤki gir toͤw peedohti ; buhtu irr wairahk bijuẜchi / wiſẜi
wiſẜi tawi Ghraͤki gir toͤw peedohti . Mehß tohpam beß ( muhſ-
ẜu ) Nopaͤllnu taißni / aran ( Deewa ) Schaͤlaſtibas / ʒaur to
Attpeſtiẜchanu / kattra ʒaur JEſum Chriſtum notickuſẜi
gir / ẜacka taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apuſtuls Pahwils . Nu warri tu arridſan /
Manns Draugs / drohẜchu Ꞩirrdi turrehteeß / ka tu ſinni / gir toͤw
Deews tawus Ghrehkus peedehwis / tad gir Wings wiſẜus ta-
wus Ghraͤkus peedehwis / gir Wings toͤw wiſẜus Ghraͤkus pee-
dehwis / tad gir Wings toͤw arridſan wiſẜu to Ꞩohdibu attlaidis /
to muhſchighu Nahwu / Elles Mohkas / und to muhſchighu Pa-
ſuẜchanu / kattru tu biji ar taweems Ghrehkeems nopellnijis . Ai-
ſto jebſche tawi Ghraͤki gir tick ẜarrkani ka Aſẜins / tad buhß
teems tomehr tick ballteem tapt / ka taß balltʒ Ꞩneegs / ẜacka
Deews patʒ py to Proweetu Eſaia .
Nu
Nu warraͤtu attkal ẜcheitan kahds no jums dohmaht : Kad
Deews mann wiſẜus mannus Ghraͤkus peedohd / unnd attlaiſch
mann irr to Ꞩohdibu / kattru eß ar teems nopellnijiß aͤßmu / ka-
pehtʒ Wings tad mann tomehr ẜcheitan wehl daſchadu Nhelaim
peeẜuhta ? Klauſẜais Manns Draugs / Ꞩchi Nhelaime / ko toͤw
Deews ẜcheit laiʒighe peeẜuhta / nhe gir allaſch Ꞩohds / bett irr
daſche reiß weena Pahrmahʒiẜchana / ka kahds Taͤhws ẜawu
Baͤhrnu pahrmahʒa / und ka mums allaſch wehl adſieteeß buhß /
mehs aͤſẜoſchi Ghrehʒeneeki / ickdeenas / ja ick⸗Atʒomirrckli mehß
ghrehkojam / und buhß joprojam labbe peeluhkoht / ka mehß pehtʒ
Deewa Prahtu dſiewojam . To mahʒa mums taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Apu-
ſtuls Pahwils / ẜatʒidams : Kad mehß ẜohditi tohpam / tad kluh-
ſtam mehß no Deewu pahrmahʒiti / ka mehß ar to Beßdeewighu
Paſẜaul nhe tohpam paſudenati{baſudenati} .
Ʒettortà kahrtà mahʒaiteeß / Manni Draughi / ka dab-
bu ẜchiß Nheweſẜels Ghraͤko⸗peedohẜchanu ? Taß Kungs
JEſus Chriſtus runna ar ẜcho Ʒillwehx / taß Ʒillwehx dſirrd tha
Kungha Chriſti Wahrdu / katters tha ſkann : Turrais labbu
Prahtu / Manns Daͤhls / tawi Ghraͤki gir toͤw peedohti .
Vnnd pehtʒ ẜchohß Wahrdus wings apſtipprena ar to Brienu-
mu / To Nheweſẜeli tudeļļ waͤſẜaͤlu darridams . Jhten tha Wings
arridſan ar mums darra{} . Kad Chriſtus JEſus mums tohß Ghrehkus
attlaiẜch unnd peedohd / tad jaͤmm Wings ẜawu Wahrdu / unnd
tahß diwi Sacramentes jeb Eeſtadiẜchanas / kattri tieri Brienu-
mi gir .
No to Wahrdu ẜacka JEſus Chriſtus / Wings leekohtʒ
mahʒiet Attkahpſchanu no Ghrehkeems / unnd Peedoh-
ẜchanu to Ghrehko ẜawà Wahrda . Vnd to paſſchu mehß
arridſan mahʒameeß aran to ẜwehtu Ewangelio / ka eekſchan to
Wahrdu JEſu CHriſti / winja ghruta Nopellna dehļ /
mehß / kattri eekſchan to titʒam / Ghrehko Peedoẜchanu
dabbujam .
Py
Py ẜcho Wahrdu pee⸗leek taß Kunngs JEſus arridſan to
ẜwaͤhtu Chriſtibu / unnd to ẜwaͤhtu Wackar⸗Ehdeni / ghribbaͤ-
dams mums peedoht tohß Ghrehkus . Kad mehß Chriſtiti toh-
pam / tad ta Chriſtiba eekſchan mums ſtrahda Ghrehko Peedoh-
ẜchanu / tick teeẜcham ka eß Chriſtietʒ aͤßmu / tick teeſcham ghribb
Wings mann mannus Ghrehkus peedoht / unnd mann par ẜawu
Baͤhrnu tahß muhſchighas Dſiewoẜchanas usjembt / taißnu und
ẜwehta darriet . Tapehtʒ ẜatʒija Ananias us Pahwili : Ʒehlleeß
aukſcham / leeʒeeß ẜoͤw Chriſtiteeß und no Ghrehkeems no-
maſghateeß . Vnd patʒ taß Apuſtuls Pahwils ẜacka : Chriſtus
JEſus ſchkieſti mums ʒaur to Vhdens⸗Pirrti eekſchan
Wahrdu / ka mums nhe gir kahds maͤllums / neds Ghrum-
ba / bett ka mehß ẜwehti aͤſẜam / und nhenoſeedſighi .
Py Deewa Ghalldu eedami / tad Wings mums ar ẜawu
paſſcha Meeſẜu aͤhdena / unnd ar ẜawu paſſchu Aſẜini dſirrdena /
katters muhſẜo dehļ ißleetʒ gir / par Peedohẜchanu muhſẜo
ghrehko . Ꞩchahs Leetas / O Ʒillwaͤhx / nhe ẜmahde / bett ja tu
ghribbi to Ghrehko Peedohẜchanu dabbuit / tad turrais py Dee-
wa Wahrdu / und py Deewa Ghalldu / no Ꞩirrds / unnd ka pee-
daͤrr / tad buhſẜi tu Deewa Baͤhrns .
Ja / ẜacki tu / tad eß JEſum Chriſtum paſſchu dſirrdaͤtu ar
mañ runnajam / ka Wings patʒ us mañ ẜatʒietu : Mañs Baͤhrns /
Tawi Ghrehki gir toͤw peedohti ? Manns Draugs / ko baͤhdajeeß
tu par to ? Nhe ſinni tu / ka tawa Mahʒetaja Ballxnis / paſſcha
JEſu Chriſti Ballxnis gir ? Jo muhſẜo Kungs Jeſus Chriſtus ẜa-
cka no ẜaweems Kallpeems / und Mahʒekļeems : Kaß juhß dſirrd /
taß dſirrd mann / ko juhß us Semmes attlaidieſẜeeta / unnd
peedohſẜeeta / taß buhß Debbeſẜieß arridſan attlaiſts und
peedohtʒ . Ta gir nu Chriſtus Jeſus teems Baſniʒas Taͤhweems
tahdu Spaͤhku und Warru dehwis / teems nabbagheems Ghreh-
ʒeneekeems tohß Ghraͤkus peedoht / uñ ko tee ẜcheitan peedohd eek-
ſchan
ſchan to Wahrdu JESV / to peedohd arridſan Deews Deb-
beſẜies .
Tahdu leelu Dahwanu und Schaͤlaſtibu ẜajemm / O Ʒill-
wehx / ar to Titʒibu / tahß Rohkas tawas titʒighas Ꞩirrds iß⸗ſteep /
und apkamp tahdu leelu Labb⸗darriſchanu / taß gir titʒi no wiſẜas
Ꞩirrds / ka Deews toͤw tawus Ghrehkus tha Kunngha JEſu
Chriſti dehl peedohd / turrais py Deewa Wahrdu / unnd leeʒeeß
tawu Titʒibu ſtipprenaht ar to ẜwehtu Wackar⸗ehdeni JESV
Chriſti / tad buhſẜi tu Deewa Baͤhrns .
To dohd mums wiſẜeems taß ſchehliegs Deews / Amen /
Amen .
Evangelium am Ʒwantʒig-
ſten Sontag nach Trinitatis /
Matth. 22.
To ẜwaͤhtu Ewangelium / ka taß wiſẜewalldiegs Paſẜau-
les⸗Konings ẜawam Daͤhlam Kahſas ar mums nab-
bagheems Ghreʒeneekeems darrijis gir / apraxta taß
ẜwaͤhtʒ Ewangeliſts Mattheus / ẜawà Ghrahmatà diwi⸗
deßmità unnd ohtrà Weetà / und ſkann tee Wahrdi juhſẜà
Wallodà tha :
JEſus
JESVS runnaja att-
kal ʒaur Liedſibu us teems Aux-
teems Baſniʒas⸗Kunngheems /
und ẜatʒija : Ta Debbeſẜes Wall-
ſtiba gir liedſa weenam Konin-
jam / katters ẜawam Daͤhlam
Kahſas darrija . Vnnd iſẜuhtija ẜawus Kallpus /
tohß Weeſẜis Kahſahß aitʒenaht . Vnnd tee nhe
ghribbeja nahkt . Attkal iſẜutija wings ʒittus Kall-
pus / und ẜatʒija / ẜackaita teem Weeſẜeem / Raughai-
ta / manns Aedenaghahds gir ẜataiſẜiets / manni
Baŗŗoma⸗lohpi gir nokauti / und wiſẜas leetas ẜat-
taiſẜitas nahʒeeta Kahſahß . Bett tee nitʒinaja to /
und noghaja / ʒitts us ẜawu Tierumu / ʒitts py ẜa-
wu Darrbu . Bett ʒitti ẜaghrabe winja Kallpus /
ẜaimoja
ẜaimoja / und nokawa tohß . Kad to taß Konings
dſirrdeja / tappa taß dußmiegs / unnd iſẜutija ẜawu
Spaͤhku / unnd licka ẜchohß Ꞩlaͤppkawus nokaut /
und eededſenaja winjo Pili .
Tad ẜatʒija Wings uhs ẜaweems Kallpeems :
Tahß Kahſas girr ghattaw ẜattaiſẜitas / bett tee
Weeſẜis nhe by ʒeenighi . Tapehtʒ eita us teem E-
leem / und aiʒenajeeta Kahſahß / kuŗŗohß juhß att-
rohdaht . Vnd tee Kallpi ißghaja us teem Eleem /
und ẜackraja / kadus attraßdami / Ļaunus und Lab-
bus / und tee Ghalldu kļua wiſẜi pilli . Tad eeghaja
taß Konings / tohß Weeſẜis apraudſiet / und eeluh-
koja weenu Ʒillwaͤku / tam nhe by Kahſa⸗Drehbes
Muggurà . Vnd ẜatʒija us to : Draugs / ka eſẜi
tu ſcheitan eenahʒis / unnd nhe eſẜi Kahſa⸗Drehbes
apwillʒiß ? Bett wings ka Maͤhms pallicka . Tad
ẜatʒijataß Konings us ẜaweem Kallpeem : Ꞩeene-
ta tam Rohkas unnd Kahjas / unnd ißmetteta to
Tumſẜibà / tur buhß Kaukẜchana und Sohbo⸗Trieſ-
ẜeẜchana . Aiſto dauds gir aiʒenati / bett mas girr
ißraͤdſaͤti .
MJeļi Draughi / Taß ẜwaͤhtʒ Deewa
Kallps Moſes taggad ghribbaͤdams mirrt /
ẜacka brienodammeeß no to Wiſẜewallditaju
Deewu : Ka ļohte mieļo wings tohß Ļau-
dis . Ja patteeß mieļo und ʒeeni taß Raddi-
taiß
taiß wiſẜo Leeto mums nabbaghus Ghreʒenekus tick ļohte und
warraͤn / tick ẜirrdighe / ka tu leelaku Mielaͤſtibu muhſcham nhe
attraſẜi . Aiſto Deews gir mums nabbaghus Semmes⸗Pieteß
tha mieļojiß / unnd tick auxte ʒeenijiß / ka Wings mums arridſan
ẜawu weenighu mieļu Daͤhlu to Kunghu JEſum Chriſtum par
Bruhdghañu dehwis und eeſchkinkojiß gir / und ar to paſſchu wiſ-
ẜu Debbeſẜes Manntu und Baggatibu . Laideeta mums nu
liexmoteeß und preeʒateeß und Deewam Ghodu doht /
aiſto tahß Kahſas tha Jaͤhra gir nahkuſchas .
Nun preeʒajeeß mieļa Chriſtita Draudſe /
Vnd laideeta mums Liexmodami deet /
Ka mehß drohſche und wiß ween lieds
Ar Preeku no Ꞩirrds dſeedam /
